manzils.text: Alif, lom, ro. In ast ojathoikitoʙi ʙo hikmat

Ojo mardum dar taaccuʙand, az in ki ʙar marde az xudason vahj kardem, ki mardumro ʙitarson va mu'minonro xusxaʙar deh, ki dar nazdi Parvardigorason pojgohe ʙaland dorand? Kofiron guftand, ki in mard oskoro codugarest

Parvardigori sumo Olloh ast, ki osmonhovu zaminro dar sas ruz ʙijofarid; sipas ʙa ars pardoxt: korhoro tadʙir kard. Cuz ʙa ruxsati U safo'atkunandae naʙosad. In ast Olloh — Parvardigori sumo. Uro ʙiparasted! Caro pand namegired

Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa Ust. In ʙarhaq va'dai Xudost. U maxluqotro ʙijofarinad. On goh ononro ʙa sui xud ʙozgardonad, to kasonero, ki imon ovarda va kori soista kardaand, az rui adl mukofot dihad. Va kofironro ʙa cazoi kufrason saroʙest az oʙi cusonu azoʙest dardovar

Ust on, ki xursedro ravsani ʙaxsidu mohro munavvar soxt va ʙarojas manozile mu'ajjan kard, to az sumori solho va hisoʙ ogoh saved. Xudo hamai inhoro cuz ʙa haq najofarid va ojotro ʙaroi mardume, ki medonand, ʙatafsil ʙajon mekunad
Dar omadusudi saʙu ruz va on ci Xudo dar osmonhovu zamin ofaridaast, ʙaroi parhezgoron iʙrathost
Kasone, ki ʙa didori Mo umed nadorand va ʙa zindagii dunjavi xusnud suda va ʙa on oromis joftaand va onon, ki az ojoti Mo ʙexaʙarand
ʙa cazoi korhoe, ki mekardaand, cojgohason cahannam ast
Ononro, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, Parvardigorason ʙa saʙaʙi imonason ʙa ʙihisthoe purne'mat, ki nahrhoi oʙ dar zeri pojason corist, hidojat mekunad
Dar on co du'ojason in ast: «Bor Xudoe, Tu poKi». Va ʙa hangomi durud salom megujand. Va pojoni du'ojason in ast: «Sukr Xudoro, on Parvardigori cahonijon»

Agar ʙo hamon sitoʙ, ki mardum ʙaroi xud xajr metalaʙand, Xudo ʙarojason sarr metalaʙid, margason faro rasida ʙud. Pas ononro, ki ʙa didori Mo umed nadorand, vomeguzorem, to dar gumrohii xud sargardon ʙimonand

Cun ʙa odami zarare rasad, ci ʙar pahlu xufta ʙosad va ci nisasta jo istoda, Moro ʙa du'o mexonad. Va cun on zararro az u dur sozem, cunon meguzarad, ki gui Moro ʙaroi daf'i on zarare, ki ʙa u rasida ʙud, hargiz naxondaast. Amalhoi isrofkoron incunin dar nazarason orosta sudaast
Va Mo mardumero, ki pes az sumo ʙudand, cun sitam kardand va ʙa pajomʙaronason, ki ʙo daloili ravsan sui onho omada ʙudand, imon nameovardand, halok kardem. Mardumi gunahkorro incunin cazo medihem
On goh sumoro dar rui zamin conisini onho gardonidem, to ʙingarem, ki ci guna amal mekuned

Cun ojoti ravsani mo ʙar onon tilovat sud, onho, ki ʙa didori Mo umed nadorand, guftand: «Qur'one ƣajri in Qur'on ʙijovar jo digargunas kun!» Bigu: «Maro narasad, ki onro az sui xud digargun kunam. Har ci ʙa man vahj mesavad, pajravi hamon hastam. Metarsam, ki agar ʙa Parvardigoram nofarmon savam, ʙa azoʙi on ruzi ʙuzurg giriftor ojam»
Bigu: «agar Xudo mexost, man onro ʙar sumo tilovat namekardam va sumoro az on ogoh namesoxtam. Va pes az in dar mijoni sumo umre zistaam. Caro ʙa aql darnamejoʙed?»
Kist sitamkortar az on, ki ʙar Xudo duruƣ meʙandad, jo ojoti Uro duruƣ meʙarorad? Alʙatta kofiron nacot namejoʙand

Ƣajri Xudo cizhoero meparastand, ki na sudason merasonad na zijon. Va megujand: «Inho safe'oni mo dar nazdi Xudojand». Bigu: «Ojo ʙa Xudo az cize xaʙar medihed, ki dar zaminu osmon az on xaʙare nadorad? Xudo pok ast va az on ci ʙo U sarik mesozed, ʙolotar ast!»
Mardum cuz jak ummat naʙudand, mijonason ixtilof aftod. Va agar na on suxane ʙud, ki pes az in az Parvardigorat sodir gasta ʙud, dar on ci ixtilof mekunand, hukm suda ʙud
Va megujand: «Caro az coniʙi Parvardigoras mu'cizae ʙar u nozil namesavad?» Bigu: «Ilmi ƣajʙ az oni Xudost. Intizor ʙikased! Man niz ʙo sumo muntazir memonam!»
Har goh pas az zarare, ki ʙa mardum rasidaast, rahmate ʙa onho ʙicasonem, ʙini, ki dar ojoti Mo ʙadandesi mekunand, ʙigu: «Makri Xudo zudtar ast». Rasuloni Mo niz ʙadandesihoi sumoro menavisand

Ust, ki sumoro dar xuski va dar darjo sajr medihad. To on goh, ki dar kistiho hastand va ʙodi muvofiq ʙa harakatason meovarad, sodmonand. Cun tufon faro rasad va mavc az har su ʙar onho rezad, cunon kn pindorand, ki dar muhosirai mavc qaror giriftaand, Xudoro az rui ixlosi aqida ʙixonand, ki agar moro az in xatar ʙirahoni, az sukrguzoron xohem ʙud

Cun Xudo onhoro ʙirahonad, ʙini, ki dar zamin ʙa nohaq sarkasi kunand. Ej mardum, in sarkasi ʙa zijoni xudaton ast. Manfiatest dar in zindagii dunjavi. On goh hama ʙa nazdi Mo ʙozmegarded to az korhoe, ki mekardaed, ogohaton sozem

Misoli in zindagii dunjo cun ʙoronest, ki az osmon nozil kunem, to ʙa on har guna rastaniho az zamin ʙirujad, ci onho, ki odamijon mexurand va ci onho, ki corpojon mecarand. Cun zamin zinati xud ʙargirift va orosta sud va mardumas pindostand, ki xud qodir ʙar on hama ʙudaand, farmoni Mo saʙhangom jo ʙa ruz darrasad va cunon az ʙexas ʙarkanem, ki gui diruz dar on makon hec ciz naʙudaast, Ojotro ʙaroi mardume, ki meandesand, incunin tafsil medihem
Xudovand ʙa saroi salomat da'vat mekunad va har kiro ʙixohad ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad
Muzdi onon, ki neki mekunand, nekist va cize afzun ʙar on. Na sijaxruj savandu na xor. Inho ahli ʙihistand va dar on covidonand

Va ʙaroi onon, ki murtakiʙi ʙadiho savand, muzdi har ʙadi monandi on ast va xori ʙar onho ƣoliʙ mesavad. Kase onhoro az xasmi Xudo nigah namedorad, cunon savand, ki gujo suratason dar porae az saʙi torik pusida suda ast. Inho ahli cahanamand va covidona dar on hastand

Va ruze hamai onhoro dar mahsar gird ovarem. Sipas musrikonro guem: «Sumo va ʙuthojaton dar makoni xud qaror gired!» Sipas onhoro az jakdigar cudo mekunem va ʙuthojason megujand: «Sumo hargiz moro nameparastidaed»
Xudo ʙa guvohi mijoni movu sumo kofist, ki mo az parastisi sumo hargiz ogoh naʙudaem
Dar on co har kas harci kardaast, cazoasro xohad did va hamaro ʙa sui Xudo — mavloi haqiqiason ʙozmegardonand va hamai on ʙuton, ki ʙa ʙotil meparastidand, noʙud mesavand

Bigu: «Ci kase az osmonu zamin ʙa sumo ruzi medihad? Kist, ki sunavoivu ʙinoi meʙaxsad? Zindaro az murda padid meorad va murdaro az zinda va korxoro ʙa somon meovarad?» Xohand guft: «Olloh». Bigu: «Ojo namotarsed?»
On Olloh — Parvardigori xaqiqii sumost, ʙa'd az haqiqat cuz gumrohi cist? Pas ʙa kuco ruj meovared
Pas suxani Parvardigori tu dar ʙorai isjongaron, ki guft: «Inho imon nameovarand», ʙa haqiqat pajvast
Bigu: «Ojo az in ʙutoni sumo kase hast, ki cizero ʙijofarinad va ʙoz zinda kunad?» Bigu: «Xudoi jakto maxluqotro meofarinad va ʙoz zinda mekunad. Pas ci guna az haq ʙerohaton mekunand?»

Bigu: «Ojo az in ʙutoni sumo kase hast, ki ʙa haq roh namojad?» Bigu: «Xudo ʙa haq roh menamojad. Ojo on, ki ʙa haq roh menamojad ʙa pajravi sazovortar ast a on ki ʙa haq roh namenamojad va xud niz muhtoci hidojat ast? Sumoro ci mesavad? Ci guna hukm mekuned?»
Bestarason faqat pajravi gumonand va gumon nametavonad coi haqro ʙigirad. Alʙatta Xudo ʙa kore, ki mekunand, ogoh ast
Nasojad, ki in Qur'onro cuz ʙa Xudo nisʙat kunand ʙalki tasdiqi cizest, ki pes az on omadaast va ʙajoni on kitoʙ ast. Sakke nest, ki az coniʙi Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Megujand, ki onro ʙa duruƣ ʙa Xudo nisʙat mekunad. Bigu: «Agar rost megued, cuz Xudo har kiro, ki metavoned, ʙa jori ʙixoned va surae monandi on ʙijovared»

Cizero duruƣ sumurdand, ki ʙa ilmi on ihota najofta ʙudand va hanuz azoʙas ʙa onho naomadaast. Kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, niz pajomʙaronro cunin ʙa duruƣ ʙarovardaand. Pas ʙingar, ki oqiʙati kori sitamkoron ci guna ʙudaast
Ba'ze az onho ʙa on imon meovarand va ʙa'ze imon nameovarand. Va IIarvardigori tu ʙa fasodkoron ogohtar ast
Agar turo ʙa duruƣ nisʙat kardan, ʙigu: «Amali man az oni man ast va amali sumo az oni sumo. Sumo az kori man ʙezored va man az kori sumo ʙezoram»
Ba'ze az onho ʙa tu gus medihand. Ojo agar darnajoʙand, tu metavoni karonro sunavo sozi
Ba'ze az onho ʙa tu menigarand. Ojo agar naʙinand, tu metavoni kuroni noʙinoro roh ʙinamoi
Xudovand ʙa mardum hec sitam namekunad, vale mardum xud ʙa xud sitam mekunand

Va ruze, ki Xudovand ononro dar mahsar gird ovarad, cunon pindori, ki tanho soate az ruz dar dunjo istodaand, jakdigarro ʙisinosand. Onho, ki didor ʙo Xudoro duruƣ, mehisoʙidand, zjajondidaand va hidojatnajoftaand
Jo ʙa'ze az cizhoero, ki ʙa onho va'da dodaem, ʙa tu menamojonem jo turo memironem. Bozgasti hamaason ʙa nazdi most va Xudo ʙa har kore, ki mekunand, sohid ast
Har ummatero pajomʙare ʙud va cun pajomʙarason ʙijomad, korho mijonason ʙa adolat hal sudand va mavridi sitam voqe' nasudand
Megujand: «Agar rost megued, pas in va'da ci vaqt xohad ʙud?»
Bigu: «Man dar ʙorai xud, cuz on ci Xudo ʙixohad, moliki hec sudu zijone nestam. Margi har ummatero zamone muajjan ast. Cun zamonason faro rasad, na jak soat der kunand va na jak soat pes ravand»
Bigu: «Ci mekuned, agar azoʙi u ʙa nogoh saʙhangom jo ʙa ruz faro rasad? Gunohkoron ci cizro incunin ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙand
Ojo cun azoʙ ʙa vuqu' pajvandad, ʙa on imon meovared? Aknun in hamon cizest, ki faro rasidanasro ʙa sitoʙ mexosted
On goh ʙa sitamkoron gujand: «Azoʙi covidro ʙicased! Ojo na cunin ast, ki dar ʙaroʙari amalhojaton cazo meʙined?»
Az tu xaʙar mepursand, ki ojo haq ast? Bigu: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoram, ki haq ast va sumoro quvvai firor az on nest!»

Agar har gunahkore sohiʙi hamai rui zamin ʙosad, xohad, ki xudro ʙa on azoʙ ʙozxarad va cun azoʙro ʙingarand, pusajmonii xud dar dil nihon dorand. Mijonason ʙa adolat hukm savad va mavridi sitam voqe' nagardand
Bidoned, ki har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast, az oni Xudost! Va ogoh ʙosed, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast, vale ʙestarason namedonand
Ust, ki zinda mekunadu memironad va hama ʙa sui U ʙozmegardand
Ej mardum, ʙaroi sumo az coniʙi Parvardigoraton pande omad va sifoe ʙaroi on ʙemorie, ki dar dil dored va rohnamoivu rahmate ʙaroi mu'minon
Bigu: «Ba fazli Xudovu rahmati U». Sodmon savand, zero in du az har ci cam' mekunand, ʙehtar ast
Bigu: «Ojo ʙa rizqe, ki Xudo ʙarojaton nozil kardaast, nigaristaed? Ba'zero harom sumurded va ʙa'zero halol». Bigu: «Xudo ʙa sumo icoza dodaast jo ʙa U duruƣ meʙanded?»
Onon, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ meʙandand, dar ʙorai ruzi qijomat ci gumon kardaand? Xudo fazli xudro ʙa mardumon arzoni medorad, vale ʙestarinason sukr namegujand

Dar har kore, ki ʙosi va har ci az Qur'on ʙixoni va dast ʙa har amale, ki ʙizaned, hangome ki ʙa on mepardozed, mo nozir ʙar sumo hastem. Bar Parvardigori tu hatto ʙa miqdori zarrae dar zaminu osmonho pusida nest. Va har ci xurdtar az on jo ʙuzurgtar az on ʙosad, dar kitoʙi muʙin navista sudaast
Ogoh ʙosed, ki ʙar dustoni Xudo ʙime nest va ƣamgin namesavand
Kasonero, ki imon ovardand va parhezgori mekardand
xusxaʙar ast onhoro dar dunjovu oxirat. Suxani Xudo digargun namesavad. In ast komjoʙii ʙuzurg
Suxani onon turo ƣamgin nasozad. Izzat ʙa tamomi az oni Xudovand ast. Ust, ki sunavovu donost
Ogoh ʙosed, ki az oni Xudost har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast va onon, ki ƣajri Xudoro sarikon mexonand, az gumoni xud pajravi mekunand va duruƣ megujand
Ust, ki saʙro ʙarojaton padid ovard, to dar on ʙijoromed va ruzro padid ovard, to dar on ʙuʙined. Dar inho ʙaroi mardume, ki mesunavand, iʙrathost
Guftand: «Xudo farzande intixoʙidast». Pok ast! Benijoz ast! Az oni Ust har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast! Sumoro ʙar on suxan dalele nest. Caro dar ʙorai Xudo cizhoe megued, ki ʙa on ogoh nested
Bigu: «Onho, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ meʙandand, nacot namejoʙand!»
Barxurdori az dunjo, on goh ʙozgastason ʙa sui Mo. Sipas ʙa cazoi kufr varzidanason azoʙe saxtason mecasonem

Barojason dostoni Nuhro ʙixon, on goh, ki ʙa qavmi xud guft: «Ej qavmi man, agar istodani man dar mijoni sumo va jodovarii ojoti Xudo ʙar sumo garon meojad, man ʙar Xudo tavakkal mekunam, koruʙori xud va ʙutonatonro gird ovared, cunon ki hec ciz az kore, ki mekuned, ʙar sumo pusida naʙosad va ʙa dusmanii man qadam ʙa pes nihed va maro muhlat nadihed
Va agar pust karded, man az sumo hec muzde naxostaam, ki muzdi man ʙo Xudost va man amr sudaam, ki az taslimsudagon ʙosam!»

Duruƣas ʙarovardand va Mo uvu hamrohonasro dar kisti ʙirahonidem va ononro conisini pesinijon soxtem va kasonero, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ mesumurdand, ƣarq kardem. Pas ʙingar, ki oqiʙati ʙimdodasudagon ci guna ʙud

On goh pas az u pajomʙarone ʙar qavmason firistodem va onon dalelhoe ravsan ovardand, vale mardum ʙa on ci pes az on duruƣ ʙarovarda ʙudand, imon ovaranda naʙudand. Bar dilhoi tacovuzkoron incunin muhr menihem
Va pas az onho Musovu Horunro hamrohi ojotamon ʙar Fir'avnu ʙuzurgoni qavmas firistodem. Va onon sarkasi kardand va mardume taʙahkor ʙudand
Va cun haq az nazdi Mo ʙa sui onho omad, guftand, ki in codue oskor ast
Muso guft: «Ojo suxani haqro, ki inak ʙar sumo nozil sudaast, codu mexoned va hol on ki codugaron nacot namejoʙand!»
Guftand: «Ojo omadai, to moro az on din, ki padaronamonro ʙar on joftaem, dur sozi, to dar zamin sarvari joʙed? Vale mo ʙa sumo imon nameovarem!»
Fir'avn guft: «Hamai codugaroni donoro nazdi man ʙijovared!»
Cun codugaron omadand, Muso guft: «Bijafkaned, har ciro, ki ʙojad ʙijafkaned!»
Cun ʙijafkandand, Muso guft: «On ci sumo ovardaed, codust va Xudo onro ʙotil xohad soxt, zero Xudo kori fasodkoronro ʙa saloh nameovarad
Va Xudovand ʙo suxanoni xud haqro ʙa isʙot merasonad, agarci gunahgoronro noxus ojad»
Az ʙimi ozori Fir'avn va ʙuzurgoni qavmi u, cuz guruhe az onho ʙa Muso imon najovardand. Va Fir'avn dar zamin ʙartari mecust va u az tacovuzkoron ʙud
Muso guft: «Ej qavmi man, agar ʙa Xudo imon ovardaed va taslimi farmon hasted, ʙa U tavakkal kuned!»
Guftand; Bar Xudo tavakkal kardem, ej Parvardigori mo, moro maƣluʙi in mardumi sitamkor makun
va ʙa rahmati xud moro az in kofiron rahoi ʙaxs!»
Ba Muso va ʙarodaras vahj kardem, ki ʙaroi qavmi xud dar Misr xonahoe muhajjo kuned va xonahoi xudro iʙodatgoh sozed va namoz guzored va mu'minonro xusxaʙar deh

Muso guft: «Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa Fir'avnu ʙuzurgoni qavmas dar in cahon zinatu amvol dodai, ej Parvardigori mo, to digaronro az tariqi Tu gumroh kunand. Ej Parvardigori mo, molhojasonro noʙud soz va dilasonro saxt kun! Imon nameovarand, to on goh, ki azoʙi dardovarro ʙingarand»
Guft: «Xosti sumo icoʙat sud, soʙitqadam ʙosed va ʙa tariqai nodonon pajravi makuned»

Mo ʙani—Isroilro az darjo guzaronidem. Fir'avnu laskarijonas ʙa qasdi sitamu tacovuz ʙa ta'qiʙason pardoxtand. Cun Fir'avn ƣark mesud, guft: «Imon ovardam, ki hec xudovande cuz on ki ʙani—Isroil ʙa on imon ovardaavd, nest va man az taslimsudagonam»
Ojo aknun? Va tu pes az in isjon mekardi va az fasodkoron ʙudi
Imruz cismi turo ʙa xuski mepartoem, to ʙaron onon, ki pas az tu memonand, iʙrate ʙosi va hol on ki ʙisjore az mardum az ojoti Mo ƣofiland

Alʙatta ʙani-Isroilro dar makone neku coj dodem va az pokiho ruzijason dodem va to on hangom, ki sohiʙi donis nasuda ʙudand, ziddijate nadostand. Parvardigori tu dar ruzi qijomat dar on ci ziddijat mekardand, mijonason hukm xohad kard

Agar dar on ci ʙar tu nozil kardaem, dar suʙha hasti, az onhoe, ki kitoʙi osmonii pes az turo mexonand, ʙipurs. Alʙatta haq ast on ci az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙar tu nozil sudaast. Pas naʙojad dar sumori suʙhakukandagon ʙosi
Va az onon, ki ojoti Xudoro duruƣ meʙarorand, maʙos, ki dar zumrai zijonkunandagon ʙosi
Kasone, ki suxani Parvardigori tu dar ʙorai onon vociʙ sudaast, imon nameovarand
harcand har guna mu'cizae ʙar onon oskor savad, to on goh, ki azoʙi dardovarro ʙingarand

Caro mardumi hec dehae, ʙa hangome ki imonasom naf'ason msdod, imon najovardand. magar qavmi Junus, ki cun imon ovardand, azoʙi xori dar dunjoro az onon ʙardostem va to hangome ki acalason faro rasid, az zindagi ʙarxurdorason kardem
Agar Parvardigori tu ʙixohad, hamai kasone, ki dar rui zaminand, imon meovarand. Ojo tu mardumro macʙur mekuni, ki imon ʙijovarand
Be xosti Xudo hec kasro narasad, ki imon ʙijovarad. Va palidiro ʙar kasone, ki xiradi xud ʙa kor nameʙarand, muqarrar mekunad
Bigu: «Bingared, ki ci cizhoe dar osmonhovu zamin ast!» Va in ojotu husdorho qavmero, ki imon nameovarand, naf' namekunad
Intizori ruzero mekasand monandi ruzhoe, ki pesinijonason muntaziras ʙudand? Bigu; «Intizor ʙikased, ki man niz ʙo sumo muntaziram!»
On goh pajomʙaronamon va kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, merahonem. Zero ʙar Mo fariza ast, ki mu'minonro ʙirahonem
Bigu: «Ej mardum, agar sumo dar dini man sak dored, man cizhoero, ki ʙa coi Olloh meparasted, nameparastam. Man Ollohro meparastam, ki sumoro memironad va amr sudaam, ki az mu'minon ʙosam!»
Va ʙa dini pok ruj ovar va az musrikon maʙos
Ba coi Olloh xudojonero, ki na ʙa tu sud merasonand va na zijon, maxon. Agar cunin kuni, az sitamkoron xohi ʙud

Va agar Xudo ʙa tu zijone ʙirasonad, cuz U kase daf'i on natavonad kard Va agar ʙaroi tu xajre ʙixohad, hec kas fazli Uro ʙoznatavonad dost. Fazli xudro ʙa har kas az ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, merasonad va U omurzandavu mehruʙon ast

Bigu: «Ej mardum, pajomi rostin az coniʙi Parvardigoraton ʙarojaton, faro rasid. Pas har kas, ki ʙa rohi rost hidojat joʙad, hidojat ʙa sudi ust. Va har ki gumroh gardad, ʙa zijoni xud ʙa gumrohi aftodaast. Va man uhdadori sumo nestam»
Cizero, ki ʙa tu vahj mesavad, pajravi kun va saʙr kun to Xudo dovari kunad, ki U ʙehtarini dovaron ast

Ammo ʙadʙaxton dar otasand va mardumonro dar on co nolae zoru farjode saxt ʙuvad
Va to osmonhovu zamin ʙoqi hastand, dar on co covidona ʙimonand, magar on ci Parvardigorat ʙixohad, zero Parvardigori tu har ci xohad, hamon kunad
Ammo nekʙaxton to osmonhovu zamin ʙoqi hastand, dar ʙihist covidon ʙimonand; ƣajri on ci Parvardigorat ʙixohad. Atoi U hec qat' namesavad
Az on ci inho meparastand, ʙa sakku suʙha maʙos. Cuz ʙa on guna, ki padaronason pes az in meparastidand, nameparastand. Mo nasiʙi ononro ʙe hec kamukost ado xohem kard
Ba Muso kitoʙ dodem. Dar on kitoʙ ixtilof sud. Agar na hukme ʙud, ki pes az coniʙi Parvardigorat sodir suda ʙud, mijonason dovari suda ʙud, ki onho dar on kitoʙ saxt dar suʙhaand
Va Parvardigori tu cazoi a'moli hamaro ʙa tamomi xohad dod va Xudo ʙa korhoe, ki mekunand, ogoh ast
Hamroh ʙo onon, ki ʙo tu ru ʙa Xudo kardaand, hamcunon, ki amr sudai, soʙitqadam ʙos. Va az had naguzared, ki U ʙa har kore, ki mekuned, ʙinost
Ba sitamkoron majl nakuned, ki otas ʙisuzonadaton. Sumoro ƣajri Xudo hec duste nest va kase joriaton nakunad
Namoz ʙiguzor dar oƣozu ancomi ruz va so'ate az saʙ. Zero nekiho ʙadihoro az mijon meʙarand. In pandest ʙaroi pandgirandagon
Saʙr kun, zero Xudovand muzdi nekukoronro taʙoh namesozad

Caro dar mijoni mardumone, ki pes az sumo ʙudand, ƣajri andake, ki az on mijon nacotason dodem, xiradmandone naʙudand, to mardumonro az fasod kardan dar zamin ʙozdorand? Zolimon az pai osudagivu lazzati dunjo raftand va gunahkor ʙudand
Parvardigori tu hec dehaero, ki mardumas nekukor ʙosand, ʙa sitam halok naxohad soxt
Va agar Parpardigori tu xosta ʙud, hamai mardumro jak ummat karda ʙud, vale xamesa gunogun xohand ʙud
magar onhoe, ki Parvardigorat ʙar onho rahmat ovarda va onhoro ʙaroi hamin ʙijofaridaast. Va suxani Parvardigori tu ʙar in muqarrar suda, ki cahannamro az hamai cinnu ins pur mekunam
Har xaʙare az axʙori pajomʙaronro ʙarojat hikojat mekunem, to turo qavidil gardonem. Va dar in kitoʙ ʙar tu suxani haq va ʙaroi mu'minon pandu nasihat nozil sudaast
Ba kasone, ki imon nameovarand, ʙigu: «Sumo ʙa ci tarz, ki xohed, amal kuned, mo niz amal mekunem
Sumo intizor ʙikased, mo niz muntazir memonem!»
Va az oni Xudost nihoni osmonhovu zamin va ʙa U ʙozgardonda mesavad hamai korho. Uro ʙiparast va ʙar U tavakkal kun, ki Parvardirorat az on ci ʙa coj meovared, ƣofil nest
Alif, lom, ro. Inhost ojoti kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo Qur'one araʙi nozilas kardaem, ʙosad, ki sumo darjoʙed
Bo in Qur'on, ki ʙa tu vahj kardaem, ʙehtarin dostonro ʙarojat hikojat mekunem, ki tu az in pes az ʙexaʙaron ʙudai
On goh, ki Jusuf ʙa padari xud guft: «Ej padar, man dar xoʙ jozdah sitora va xursed va moh didam, didam, ki sacdaam mekunand»
Guft: «Ej pisari xurdakam, xoʙatro ʙaroi ʙarodaronat hikojat makun, ki turo hilae meandesand, Zero sajton odamijonro dusmane oskor ast

Va incunin Parvardigorat turo ʙarmeguzinad va ta'ʙiri xoʙ meomuzad va hamcunon, ki ne'mati xudro pes az in ʙar padaroni tu Iʙrohimu Ishoq komil karda ʙud, ʙar tuvu xonadoni Ja'quʙ ham komil mekunad, ki Parvardigorat donovu hakim ast!»
Dar dostoni Jusuf va ʙarodaronas ʙaroi onon, ki az on pursidaand, iʙrathost
On goh, ki guftand: «Jusuf va ʙarodaras nazdi padaramon mahʙuʙtar az mo hastand, hol on ki mo xud guruhe nerumandem. Padaramon dar gumrohii oskorest»
«Jusufro ʙikused jo dar sarzamine digaras ʙiandozed, to padar xosi sumo gardad va az on pas mardume soista garded»
Jake az onho guft: «Agar mexohed kore kuned, Jusufro nakused; dar qa'ri toriki cohas ʙipartoed, to korvone uro ʙigirad»
Guftand: Ej padar, ci sud, ki moro ʙar Jusuf ʙovari namekuni, hol on ki mo xajrxohi u hastem
Fardo uro ʙo mo ʙifirist, to ʙigardadu ʙozi kunad va mo nigahdoras hastem»
Guft: «Agar uro ʙiʙared, ƣamgin mesavam va metarsam, ki az u ƣofil saved va gurg uro ʙixurad»
Guftand: «Bo in guruhi nerumand, ki mo hastem, agar gurg uro ʙixurad, az zijonkoron xohem ʙud»
Cun uro ʙurdand va qasd kardand, ki dar qa'ri toriki cohas ʙijafkanand, ʙa u vahj kardem, ki onhoro az in korason ogoh xohi soxt va xud nadonand
Saʙhangom girjon nazdi padarason ʙoz omadand
Guftand: «Ej padar, mo ʙa asp toxtan rafta ʙudem va Jusufro nazdi mato'i xud guzosta ʙudem, gurg uro xurd. Va harcand ham, ki rost ʙiguem, tu suxani moro ʙovar nadori»
Comaasro, ki ʙa xuni duruƣin oƣusta ʙud, ovardand, guft: «Nafsi sumo korero dar nazaraton ʙijorosta ast. Aknun ʙaroi man saʙri camil ʙehtar ast va Xudost, ki dar in ʙora az u jori ʙojad xost»
Korvone omad. Oʙovarasonro firistodand. Satil furu kard. Guft: «Muƶdagoni, in pisarest». Uro cun mato'e pinhon soxtand va Xudo ʙa kore, ki mekardand, ogoh ʙud
Uro ʙa ʙahoi andak, ʙa cand dirham furuxtand, ki hec raƣʙate ʙa u nadostand

Kase az mardumi Misr, ki uro xarida ʙud, ʙa zanas guft: «To dar in cost, giromijas ʙidor, sojad ʙa mo sude ʙirasonad, jo uro ʙa farzandi ʙipazirem». Va incunin Jusufro dar zamin coj dodem, to ʙa u ta'ʙiri xoʙ omuzem. Va Xudo ʙar kori xes ƣoliʙ ast. Vale ʙestari mardum namedokand
Va cun ʙoliƣ sud, hikmatu donisas dodem va nekukoronro incunin mukofot medihem

Va on zan, ki Jusuf dar xonaas ʙud, dar pai komcui az Jusuf meʙud. Va darhoro ʙastu guft: «Bisitoʙ». Guft: «Panoh meʙaram ʙa Xudo, U parvaronandai man ast va maro oʙrui neku doda va sitamkoron nacotjofta namesavand»
On zan majli u kard. Va agar ʙurhoni Parvardigorasro nadida ʙud, u niz majli on zan mekard. Cunin kardem, to ʙadivu zistkoriro az vaj ʙozgardonem. Zero u az ʙakdagoni pokdili Mo ʙud

Har du ʙa coniʙi dar davidand va zan comai uro az pas ʙidarid. Va sui on zanro nazdiki dar didand. Zan guft: «Cazoi kase, ki ʙo zani tu qasdi ʙade dosta ʙosad, cist, cuz in ki ʙa zindon aftad jo ʙa azoʙe dardovar giriftor ojad?»
Jusuf guft: «U dar pai komcui az man ʙud va maro ʙa xud xond». Va jake az kasoni zan guvohi dod, ki agar comaas az pes daridaast, zan rost megujad va u duruƣgust
Va agar comaas az pas daridaast, zan duruƣ megujad va u rostgust
Cun did comaas az pas daridaast, guft: «In az makri sumo zanon ast, ki makri sumo zanon makre ʙuzurg ast
Ej Jusuf, zaʙoni xud nigoh dor va ej zan, az gunohi xud ʙaxsois ʙixoh, ki tu az xatokoroni»
Zakoni sahr guftand: «Zani Aziz dar pai komcui az ƣulomi xud sudaast va seftai u gasta ast. Mo vajro dar gumrohii oskoro meʙipem»

Cun afsunasonro sunid, nazdason kas firistod va maclise tartiʙ dod va ʙa har jak korde dod va guft: «Berun oj, to turo ʙingarand». Cun uro didand, ʙuzurgas sumurdand va dasti xes ʙiʙuridand va guftand: «Ma'ozalloh in odami nest, in faristae ʙuzurgvor ast!»
Guft: «In hamon ast, ki maro dar ʙoʙi u malomat mekarded. Man dar pai komcui az u ʙudam va u xudro nigoh dost. Agar on ci farmonas mediham, nakunad, ʙa zindon xohad aftod va xor xohad sud»
Guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, ʙaroi man zindon dust dostanitar ast az on ci maro ʙa on mexonand va agar makri in zanonro az man nagardoni, ʙa onho majl mekunam va dar sumori nodonon darmeojam»
Parvardigoras du'ojasro icoʙat kard va makri zanon az u dur kard. Zero Xudo sunavovu donost
Pas ʙo on nisonaho, ki dida ʙudand, tasmim kardand, ki cande ʙa zindonas ʙijafkanand

Du cavon niz ʙo u ʙa zindon aftodand. Jake az on du guft: «Dar xoʙ xudro didam, ki angur mefisoram». Digare guft: «Xudro didam, ki non ʙar sar nihoda meʙaram va parrandagon az on mexurand. Moro az ta'ʙiri on ogoh kun, ki az nekukoronat meʙinem»

Guft: «Ta'omi ruzonai sumo hanuz naomada ʙosad, ki pes az on sumoro az ta'ʙiri on xoʙho, cunon ki Parvardigoram ʙa man omuxtaast, xaʙar mediham. Man dini mardumero, ki ʙa Xudoi jakto imon nadorand va ʙa ruzi qijomat kofirand, tark kardaam

Man pajravi dini padaronam Iʙrohimu Ishoqu Ja'quʙ hastam va moro nasojad, ki hec cizro sariki Xudo qaror dihem. In fazilatest, ki Xudo ʙar movu ʙar mardumi digar arzoni dostaast, vale ʙestari mardum nosukrand
Ej du zindoni, ojo xudojoni parokanda ʙehtar ast jo Olloh — on Xudovandi jaktoi ƣoliʙ ʙar hamagon

Nameparasted ƣajri Xudoi jakto magar ʙutonero, ki xud va padaronaton onhoro ʙa nomhoe xondaed va Xudo huccate ʙar isʙoti onho nozil nakardaast. Hukm cuz hukmi Xudo nest. Farmon dodaast, ki cuz uro naparasted. In ast dini rostu ustuvor, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
Ej du zindoni, ammo jake az sumo ʙaroi xocai xud saroʙ rezad, ammo digarero ʙar dor kunand va parrandagon sari u ʙixurand. Kore, ki dar ʙorai on nazar mexosted, ʙa pojon omadaast»
Ba jake az on du, ki medonnst, raho mesavad, guft: «Maro nazdi xocai xud jod kun!» Ammo sajton az xotiras dur kard, ki pesi mavlojas az u jod kunad va cand sol dar zindon ʙimond
Podsoh guft: «Dar xoʙ haft govi farʙehro didam, ki onhoro haft govi loƣar mexurand va haft xusai saʙz didam va haft xusai xusk. Ej xosagoni man, xoʙi maro ta'ʙir kuned, agar ta'ʙiri xoʙ medoned»
Guftand: «Inho xoʙhoi osuftaast va moro ʙa ta'ʙiri in xoʙho ogohi nest»
Jake az on du, ki raho suda ʙud va pas az muddate ʙa jodas omada ʙud, guft: «Man sumoro az ta'ʙiri on ogoh mekunam. Maro nazdi u ʙifiristed»
«Ej Jusuf, ej mardi rostguj, ʙaroi mo ta'ʙir kun, ki haft govi farʙehro haft govi loƣar mexurand va haft xusai saʙzu haft xusai xusk. Bosad, ki man nazdi mardum ʙozgardam va onon ogoh gardand»
Guft: «Haft sol paj dar paj ʙikored va har ci medaraved, cuz andake, ki mexured, ʙo xusa anʙor kuned
Az on pas haft sol kaxti meojad va dar on haft sol on ci ʙarojason cam' kardaand, ʙixurand ƣajri andake, ki nigoh medored
Pas az on sole ojad, ki mardumonro ʙoron dihand va dar on sol afsurdanihoro mefusurand»

Podsoh guft: «Nazdi manas ʙijovared». Cun firistoda nazdi u omad, Jusuf guft: «Nazdi xocaat ʙozgard va ʙipurs: Hikojati on zanon, ki dasthoi xudro ʙuridand, ci ʙud? Ki Parvardigori man ʙa makrason ogoh ast!»

Guft: «Ej zanon, on goh ki xostori tani Jusuf meʙuded, hikojati sumo ci ʙud?» Guftand: «Panoh ʙar Xudo! Uro hec gunahkor namedonem». Zani Aziz guft: «Aknun haq oskor sud. Man dar pai komcui az u meʙudam va u dar zumrai rostgujon ast!»
«Cunin sud to ʙidonad, ki man dar ƣajʙatas ʙa u xijonat nakardaam va Xudo hilai xoinonro ʙa maqsad namerasozdad
Man xudamro ʙegunoh namedonam, zero nafs odamiro ʙa ʙadi farmon medihad. Magar Parvardigori man ʙiʙaxsojad, zero Parvardigori man omurzandavu mehruʙon ast!»
Podsoh guft: «Uro nazdi man ʙijovared to hamnisini xosi xud gar donam». Va cun ʙo u suxan guft, guft; «Tu az imruz nazdi mo sohiʙmartaʙa va ʙovarinok hasti»
Guft: «Maro ʙar xazinahoi in sarzamin muqarrar kun, ki man nigahʙone donojam»
Incunin Jusufro dar on sarzamin oʙru dodem. Har co, ki mexost, coj megirift. Rahmati xudro ʙa har kas, ki ʙixohem, arzoni medorem va muzdi nekukoronro ʙarʙod namekunem
Va alʙatta muzdi oncahoni ʙaroi kasone, ki imop ovardaand va parhezgori mekunand, ʙehtar ast
Barodaroni Jusuf omadand va ʙar u doxil sudand, onhoro sinoxt va onho nasinoxtandas
Cun ʙorhojasonro muhajjo soxt, guft: «Barodari padarijatonro niz nazdi man ʙijovared, ojo nameʙined, ki pajmonaro komil ado mekunam va ʙehtarin mizʙonam
Agar uro nazdi man najovared, pajmonae nazdi man naxohed dost va ʙa man nazdik masaved»
Guftand: «Mo uro ʙa isror az padar xohem xost va in korro xohem kard»
Va ʙa mardoni xud guft: «Sarmojaasonro dar ʙorhojason ʙinihed, ʙosad, ki cun nazdi kasonason ʙozgardand va onro ʙijoʙand, ʙoz ojand»
Cun nazdi padar ʙozgastand, guftand: «Ej padar, pajmona az mo man' namudand. Barodaramonro ʙo mo ʙifirist, to pajmona ʙozgirem. Mo nigahdori u hastem»
Guft: «Ojo uro ʙa sumo ʙisuporam, hamcunon ki ʙarodarasro pes az in ʙa sumo supurdam?» Xudo ʙehtarin nigahdor ast va Ust mehruʙontarini mehruʙonon

Cun ʙori xudro kusudand, didand, ki sarmojaasonro pas dodaand. Guftand: «Ej padar, dar talaʙi ci hastem? In sarmojai most, ki ʙa mo pas dodaand. Baroi kasoni xud ƣalla ʙijovarem va ʙarodaramonro hifz kunem va ʙori suture afzun girem, ki on ci dorem, andak ast»

Guft: «Hargiz uro ʙo sumo namefiristam, to ʙo man ʙa nomi Xudo pajmone ʙiʙanded, ki nazdi manas ʙozmeovared. Magar on ki hama giriftor saved». Cun ʙo u ahd kardand, guft: «Xudo ʙar on ci meguem, guvoh ast!»

Guft: «Ej pisaroni man, az jak darvoza doxil nasaved; az darvozahoi gunogun doxil saved. Va man qazoi Xudoro az sari sumo daf' natavonam kard va hec farmone ƣajri farmoni Xudo nest. Bar U tavakkal kardam va tavakkalkunandagon ʙar U tavakkul kunand»

Cun az coe, ki padar farmon doda ʙud, doxil sudand, in kor dar ʙaroʙari irodai Xudo sudason naʙaxsid. Tanho hocate dar zamiri Ja'quʙ ʙud, ki onro oskor soxt, zero uro ilme ʙud, ki Xud ʙa u omuxta ʙudem, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
Cun ʙar Jusuf doxil sudand, ʙarodarasro nazdi xud coj dod. Guft: «Man ʙarodari tu hastam. Az kore, ki inho kardaand, anduhgin maʙos»
Cun ʙorhojasonro muhajjo kard, comro dar ʙori ʙarodar nihod. On goh munodi (sadodihanda) sado dod: «Ej korvonijon, sumo duzdoned»
Korvonijon nazdi onho ʙozgastand va guftand: «Ci gum kardaed?»
Guftand: «Comi podsohro. Va har ki ʙijovaradas, uro ʙori suturest va man kafili mekunam»
Guftand: «Xudoro, sumo xud medoned, ki mo fasod kardan ʙa in sarzamin najomadaem va duzd naʙudaem»
Guftand: «Agar duruƣ gufta ʙosed, cazoi duzd cist?»
Guftand: «Cazojas hamon kasest, ki dar ʙori u jofta savad. Pas u xud cazoi amali xud ast va mo gunahkoronro cunin cazo dihem»

Pes az ʙori ʙarodar ʙar ʙori onho koftanro sar kard, on goh az ʙori ʙarodaras ʙerun ovard. Hilae incunin ʙa Jusuf omuxtem. Dar dini on podsoh giriftani ʙarodar xaqqi u naʙud, cize ʙud, ki Xudo mexost. Har kasro, ki ʙixohem, ʙa daracote ʙolo meʙarem va ʙoloi har donoe donotarest

Guftand: «Agar u duzdi karda, ʙarodaras niz pes az in duzdi karda ʙud». Jusuf cavoʙi on suxan dar dil pinhon dost va hec izxor nakard va guft: «Sumo dar vaz'e ʙadtar hasted va Xudo ʙa ʙuhtone, ki mezaned, ogohtar ast!»
Guftand: «Ej aziz, uro padarest solxurda. Jake az moro ʙa coi u ʙigir, ki az nekukoronat meʙinem»
Guft: «Xudo nakunad, ki cuz on kasro, ki ʙori xud nazdi u joftaem, ʙigirem. Agar cunin kunem, az sitamkoron xohem ʙud»

Cun az u noumed sudand, ʙaroi masvarat ʙa kanore raftand va ʙuzurgtarinason guft: «Ojo namedoned, ki padaraton az sumo ʙa nomi Xudo pajmon girifta va pes az in niz dar haqqi Jusuf kutohi kardaed? Man az in sarzamin ʙerun nameojam, to padar maro ruxsat dihad jo Xudo dar ʙorai man dovari kunad, ki U ʙehtarini dovaron ast
Nazdi padar ʙozgarded va ʙigued: «Ej padar, pisarat duzdi kard va mo cuz ʙa on ci medonistem, sahodat nadodem va az ƣajʙ niz ogoh nestem
Az sahre, ki dar on ʙudaem va az korvone, ki hamrohas omadaem ʙipurs, ki mo rost meguem»
Guft: «Na, nafsi sumo korero dar nazaraton ʙijorost va maro saʙri camil ʙehtar ast. Sojad Xudo hamaro ʙa man ʙozgardonad, ki U donovu hakim ast!»
Rui xud az onho ʙigardonidu guft: «Ej anduho ʙar Jusuf». Va casmonas az ƣam sapedi girift va hamcunon anduhi xud furu mexurd
Guftand: «Ba Xudo savgand pajvasta Jusufro jod mekuni, to ʙemor gardi jo ʙimiri»
Guft; «Cuz in nest, ki sarhi anduhi xud tanho ʙo Xudo megujam. Zero on ci man az Xudo medonam, sumo namedoned
Ej pisaroni man, ʙiravedu Jusuf va ʙarodarasro ʙicued va az rahmati Xudo noumed masaved. Zero tanho kofiron az rahmati Xudo ma'jus mesavand»

Cun ʙar Jusuf doxil sudand, guftand: «Ej aziz, movu kasonamon ʙa gurusnagi aftodaem va ʙo sarmojai andak omadaem, pajmonai moro tamom ado kun va ʙar mo sadaqa ʙideh zero Xudo sadaqadihandagonro dust dorad!»
Guft: «Medoned, ki az rui nodoni ʙo Jusuf va ʙarodaras ci karded?»
Guftand: «Ojo ʙa haqiqat tu Jusufi?» Guft: «Man Jusufam va in ʙarodari man ast va Xudo ʙa mo ne'mat dod. Zero har kas, ki parhezgori kunad va saʙr namojad, Xudo muzdasro noʙud namesozad»
Guftand: «Ba Xudo savgand, ki xudo turo ʙar mo fazilat dod va mo xatokor ʙudem»
Guft: «Imruz sumoro sarzanis naʙojad kard; Xudo sumoro meʙaxsojad, ki U mehruʙontarini mehruʙonon ast
In comai maro ʙiʙared va ʙar rui padaram andozed to ʙino gardad. Va hamai kasoni xudro nazdi man ʙijovared»
Cun korvon ʙa roh aftod, padarason guft: «Agar maro devona naxoned, ʙui Jusuf his mekunam»
Guftand: «Ba Xudo savgand, ki tu dar hamon gumrohii derinan xud hasti!»
Cun muƶdadihanda omad va coma ʙar rui u andoxt, ʙino gast. Guft: «Ojo naguftamaton, ki on ci man az Xudo medonam, sumo namedoned?»
Guftand: «Ej padar, ʙaroi gunohoni mo omurzis ʙixoh, ki mo xatokor ʙudaem»
Guft; «Az Parvardigoram ʙaroi sumo ʙaxsois xoham xost, U ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast!»
Cun ʙar Jusuf doxil sudand, padaru modarro ʙa oƣus kasidu guft: «Ba Misr daroed, ki agar Xudo ʙixohad, dar amon xohed ʙud!»

Padaru modarro ʙar taxt ʙarovard va hama dar ʙaroʙari u ʙa sacda daromadand. Guft: «Ej padar, in ast ta'ʙiri on xoʙi man, ki inak Parvardigoram onro rost ʙarovard. Va ci qadar ʙa man neki kardaast, on goh, ki maro az zindon ʙirahonid va pas az on, ki sajton mijoni manu ʙarodaronam fasod karda ʙud, sumoro az ʙodija ʙa in co ovard. Parvardigori man ʙa har ci iroda kunad, daqiq ast, ki U donovu hakim ast
Ej Parvardigori man, maro farmonravoi dodi va maro ilmi ta'ʙiri xoʙ omuxti. Ej ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin, tu dar dunjovu oxirat korsozi mani. Maro musalmon ʙimiron va qarini soistagon soz!»
Inho xaʙarhoi ƣajʙ ast, ki ʙa tu vahj mekunem. Va on hangom, ki ʙo jakdigar gird omada ʙudand va masvarat mekardand va xila mesoxtand, tu nazdi onho naʙudi
Harcand tu ʙa imonason haris ʙosi, ʙestari mardum imon nameovarand
Va tu dar muqoʙili pajomʙarijat az onho muzde nametalaʙi va in kitoʙ cuz pande ʙaroi mardumi cahon nest
Ci ʙisjor nisonahoe dar osmonhovu zamin ast, ki ʙar on meguzarand va az on ruj ʙarmetoʙand
Va ʙestarason ʙa Xudo imon najovarand, ʙalki hamcunon musrikand
Ojo pindorand, ki emini joftaand az in, ki uquʙate umumi az azoʙi Xudo onhoro furu girad jo qijomat ʙa nogoh faro rasad, ʙe on ki xaʙardor savand
Bigu: «In rohi man ast. Manu pajravonam hamagonro ʙo dalelu huccat ʙa sui Xudo mexonem. Pok ast Xudo va man az musrikon nestam!»

Va Mo pes az tu ʙa pajƣamʙari nafiristodem magar mardonero az mardumi dehaho, ki ʙa onhovahj mekardem. Ojo dar rui zamin namegardand, to ʙingarand, ki pojoni kori pesinijonason ci ʙudaast? Va olami oxirat parhezgoronro ʙehtar ast, caro nameandesed
Cun pajomʙaron navmed sudand va cunon donistand, ki onhoro duruƣ meʙarorand, joriason kardem va har kiro, ki xostem, nacot dodem va azoʙi Mo az mardumi gunahkor ʙozgardonida nasavad
Dar dostonhojason xiradmandonro iʙratest. In dostone soxta nest, ʙalki tasdiqi suxani pesinnjon va tafsili har cizest ʙaroi onho, ki imon ovardaand, hidojat astu rahmat
Alif, lom, mim, ro. Inho ojoti in kitoʙ ast va on ci az Parvardigorat ʙar tu nozil sudaast, haq ast, vale ʙestari mardum imon nameovarand

Olloh — hamon Xudovandest, ki osmonhoro ʙe hec sutune, ki onro ʙuʙined, ʙarafrost. Sipas ʙa ars pardoxt va oftoʙu mohro, ki har jak to zamone muajjan dar sajrand, rom kard. Korhoro megardonad va ojotro ʙajon mekunad, ʙosad, ki ʙa didori Parvardigoraton jaqin kuned
Ust, ki zaminro ʙigusturd va dar on kuhxovu rudho qaror dod va az har meva cuft-cuft padid ovard va saʙro dar ruz mepusonad. Dar inho iʙrathost ʙaroi mardume, ki meandesand

Va ʙar rui zamin qit'ahoest dar kanori jakdigar va ʙoƣhoi anguru knstzorho va naxlhoe, ki dutana az jak resa rusta ast jo jaktana az jak resa va hama ʙa jak oʙ seroʙ mesavand va dar samara ʙa'zero dar ʙa'ze digar ʙartari nihodaem. Alʙatta dar inho ʙaroi xiradmandon iʙrathost

Agar tu dar hajrat meoi, taaccuʙ dar suxani onho ast, ki ojo on hangom, ki xok savem, az nav moro ʙijofarinad? Inho ʙa Parvardigorason imon nadorand, ʙar gardanhoson tavqho ʙosad va ahli cahannamand va dar on covidonaand
Ba sitoʙ az tu pes az xajru ʙaxsois azoʙ metalaʙand. Pes az onho azoʙhoe ʙudaast va Parvardigori tu mardumro, ʙo on ki sitam kardaand, meʙaxsad va niz Parvardigori tu ʙa saxti uquʙat mekunad
Kofiron megujand: «Caro az coniʙi Parvardigoras mu'cizae ʙar u nozil namesavad?» Cuz in nest, ki tu ʙimdihandae hasti va har qavmero rohnamoest
Xudo medonad, ki har zane ci dar rahm dorad va on ci rahmho kohad va on ci rahmho afzojad. Va har cizro dar nazdi U miqdore mu'ajjan ast
Donoi nihonu oskor — on Xudom ʙuzurgi ʙalandmartaʙa
Baroi U jakson ast az sumo har ki suxan ʙa pinhon gujad jo ʙa oskoro. Va on ki dar pardai saʙ pinhon mesavad va on ki dar ruz ʙa oskoro meravad

Odamiro faristagonest, ki pajopaj ʙa amri Xudo az ruʙaruvu pusti saras meojand va nigahʙonijas mekunand. Xudo cizero, ki az oni mardumest, digargun nakunad, to on mardum xud digargun savand. Cun Xudo ʙaroi mardume ʙadi xohad, hec ciz mone'i U natavonad sud va onhoro ƣajri Xudo hec korsoze nest
Ust, ki ʙarqro goh ʙaroi tarsonidan va goh ʙaroi umed ʙaxsidan ʙa sumo menamojonad va aʙrhoi garonʙorro padid meovarad

Ra'd ʙa sitoisi U va faristagon az ʙimi U tasʙeh mekunand. Va otasakhoro mefiristad va har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa on oseʙ merasonad. Boz ham dar ʙorai Xudo ʙahsu cidol mekunand. Va U ʙa saxti uquʙat mekunad

Xosi Ust duovu ilticoi rostin. Onho, ki cuz Uro iltico mekunand, hec posuxason namegujand. Monandi kase, ki du dast ʙa sui oʙ ʙarad to oʙ ʙa dahon rasonad va natavonad, ki oʙ ʙa dahon rasonad. Va du'oi kofiron cuz ʙa gumrohi nest
Xohu noxoh ʙaroi Xudovand sacda mekunand hamai onho, ki dar osmonhovu zaminand va sojahojason niz ʙomdodonu somgohon ʙa sacda meojand. (Sacda)

Bigu: «Kist Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin?» Bigu: «Olloh». Bigu; «Ojo ƣajri U xudojone giriftaed, ki qodir ʙa sudu zijoni xud nestand? Bigu: «Ojo noʙinovu ʙino ʙaroʙarand? Jo torikivu ravsani jaksonand? Jo sarikone, ki ʙaroi Xudo qoil sudaand, cizhoe ofaridaand, monandi on ci Xudo ofaridaast va onon dar ʙorai ofarinis ʙa istiʙoh aftodaand?» Bigu: «Olloh ofarinandai har cizest va U jagonavu qahhor ast!»

Az osmon oʙ firistod va har jak cuje ʙa andozai xud cori sud va oʙi ravon kaf (k) ʙar sar ovard. Va az on ci ʙar otas megudozand, to zevaru mato'e sozand, niz kafke ʙar sar ojad. Xudo ʙaroi haqqu ʙotil cunin masal zanad, Ammo kafk ʙa kanore aftad va noʙud savad va on ci ʙaroi mardum sudmand ast, dar zamin pojdor ʙimonad. Xudo incunin misol meorad

Baroi onon, ki da'vati parvardigorasonro qaʙul kardand, mukofoti nekuest. Va kasone, ki da'vati Uro qaʙul nakardand, agar har on ciro, ki ʙar rui zamin ast va monandi onro dosta ʙosand, onro fido dihand, onon ʙa saxti ʙozxost xohand sud va makonason cahannam ast va ʙad cojgohest
Ojo kase, ki medonad on ci az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙar tu nozil suda haq ast monandi kasset, ki noʙinost? Tanho xiradmandon pand megirand
kasone, ki ʙa ahdi Xudo vafo mekunand va xud pajmon namesikanand
onon, ki on ciro Xudo ʙa pajvastani on farmon doda, pajvand mekunand va az Parvardigorason metarsand va az saxtii hisoʙi Xudovand ʙimnokand

onon, ki ʙa talaʙi savoʙi Parvardigori xud saʙr pesa kardand va namoz guzoridand va dar nihonu oskor az on ci ʙa onho ruzi dodaem, xajr kardand va ʙadiro ʙo neki ʙarmegardonand. Oqiʙati neki oxirat az onhost
Bihisthoi covidon onho va har ki nekukor ʙudaast az padaronu hamsaron va farzandonason, ʙadon doxil savand va faristagon az har dar ʙa nazdason ojand
Salom ʙar sumo ʙa xotiri on hama saʙre, ki kardaed. Saroi oxirat ci saroe nekust
Va onho, ki pajmoni Xudoro pas az ʙastanas mesikanand va on ciro, ki Xudo ʙa pajvastani on farmon doda, qat' mekunand va dar zamin fasod mekunand, la'nat ʙar onhost va ʙadihoi on cahon nasiʙason
Xudo har kiro xohad, ruzii ʙisjor dihad jo ruzii andak. Va mardum ʙa zindagii dunjo xusnudand, hol on ki zindagii dunjo dar ʙaroʙari zindagii oxirat cuz andak mato'e nest
Kofiron megujand: «Caro az coniʙi Parvardigoras mu'cizae ʙar u nozil namesavad?» Bigu: «Xudo har kiro ʙixohad, gumroh mekunad. Va har kiro ʙa dargohi U ruj kunad, hidojat mekunad»
Onhoe, ki imon ovardaand va dilhojason ʙa jodi Xudo oromis mejoʙad, ogoh ʙosed, ki dilho ʙa jodi Xudo oromis mejoʙad
Zindagii xus va ʙozgastangohi neku az oni kasonest, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand

Hamcunin turo ʙa mijoni ummate, ki pes az onxo ummathoi digar ʙudaand, ʙa pajƣamʙari firistodaem, to on ciro, ki ʙar tu vahj kardaem, ʙarojason tilovat kuni va onho ʙa Rahmon kofir mesavand. Bigu: «U Parvardigori man ast. Xudoe cuz U nest. Bar U tavakkal kardaam va tavʙai man ʙa dargohi Ust!»

Agar Qur'one tavonist ʙud, ki kuhho ʙa on ʙa cunʙis ojand jo zamin pora-pora savad, jo murdagonro ʙa suxan orad, cuz in Qur'on nameʙud, ki hamai korho az oni Xudost. Ojo mu'minon hanuz nadonistaand, ki agar Xudo mexost, hamai mardumro hidojat mekard? Va kofironro pajvasta ʙa saʙaʙi amalhojason hodisae rasad jo on hodisa dar nazdikii xonahojason furud ojad, to on goh, ki va'dai Xudo ojad, zero Xudo xilofi va'da namekunad
Pajomʙarone ham, ki pes az tu ʙudand, ʙa masxara girifta sudand. Man ʙa kofiron muhlat dodam, on goh hamaro furu giriftam va on uquʙati man ci saxt ʙud

Ojo on ki ʙar hamai mardum va amalhojason nozir ast, monandi ʙuton ast? Baroi Xudo sarikone qoil sudand. Bigu: «Onhoro nom ʙiʙared. Sojad mexohed Uro az cize dar rui zamin ogoh kuned, ki namedonad, jo suxanoni ʙehuda megujand?» Dar nazari kofiron makrason orosta omad va az rohi rost ʙeroh sudand. Va har kiro Xudo gumroh kunad, hec rohnamoe nadorad
Dar in zindagii dunjo ʙa azoʙe giriftor ojand va azoʙi oxirat saxttar ast va onhoro hec nigahdorandae az azoʙi Xudo nest
Sifati ʙihiste, ki ʙa parhezgoron va'da suda: oʙ az zeri daraxtonas ravon ast va mevahovu sojaas hamesagist. In sarancomi kasonest, ki parhezgorand va sarancomi kofiron otas ast

Ahli kitoʙ az on ci ʙar tu nozil suda, sodmonand. Va az on camo'at kasone hastand, ki ʙa'ze az onro inkor mekunand. Bigu: «Man amr sudaam, ki Xudoi jaktoro ʙiparastam va ʙa U sirk najovaram. Ba sui U da'vat mekunam va ʙozgasti man ʙa sui Ust
Hamcunin Qur'onro ʙa zaʙoni araʙi nozil kardem. Agar pas az donise, ki ʙa tu rasida, az pai xohishoi onho ʙiravi, dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi Xudo korsozu nigahdorandae naxohi dost

Ba tahqiq pes az tu pajomʙarone firistodaem va ʙarojason hamsaronu farzandon qaror dodaem. Va hec pajomʙarero haqqi on naʙud, ki cuz ʙa farmoni Xudo ojate ʙijovarad va har amrero zamone navistasuda ast
Xudo har ciro ʙixohad, mahv jo isʙot mekunad va ummulkitoʙ nazdi Ust
Agar ʙa'ze az on ciro ki ʙa onho va'da kardaem, ʙa tu nison dihem, jo turo pes az vaqt ʙimironem, dar har hol on ci ʙar uhdai tust, taʙliƣ ast va on ci ʙar uhdai most, hisoʙ kardan
Ojo hanuz nadonistaand, ki mo az atrofi in sarzamin kam mekunem va Xudo hukm mekunad va hec ciz hukmi Uro rad namekunad va U zud ʙa hisoʙi hama merasad
Kasone, ki pes az inho ʙudand, makrho kardand, vale hamai makrho nazdi Xudovand ast. Medonad, ki har kase ci mekunad. Va kofiron ʙa zudi xohand donist, ki nekuii oxirat az oni kist
Kofiron megujand, ki tu pajomʙar nesti. Bigu: «Xudo va har kas, ki az kitoʙ ogohi dosta ʙosad, ʙa sohidi mijoni manu sumo kofist
Alif, lom, ro. Kitoʙest, ki ʙar tu nozil kardem, to mardumro ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason az toriki ʙa rusnoi ʙiʙari va ʙa rohi Xudoi piruzmandi sutudani (hamai zaʙonho sukri Ukunand) roh namoi
Xudoe, ki har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast, az oni Ust! Pas voj ʙar kofiron az azoʙe saxt
Onhoe, ki zindagii dunjoro az oxirat dusttar dorand va digaronro az rohi Xudo ʙozmedorand va onro munharif (kacrav nison dodanasro) mexohand, saxt dar gumrohi hastand

Har pajomʙarero faqat ʙa zaʙoni mardumas firistodem, to ʙitavonad pajomi Xudoro ʙarojason ʙajon kunad. Pas Xudo har kiro ʙixohad, gumroh mekunad va har kiro ʙixohad, hidojat mekunad va Ust piruzmandu hakim
Musoro ʙo ojoti xud firistodem, ki qavmi xudro az toriki ʙa rusani ʙerun or va ruzhoi Xudoro ʙa jodason ʙijovar. Va dar in ʙaroi har saʙrkunandai sukrguzor iʙrathoest

Va Muso ʙa qavmi xud guft: «Ne'matero, ki Xudo ʙar sumo arzoni dostaast, ʙa jod ovared, on goh ki sumoro az fir'avnijon ʙirahonid. Ba saxti ozoraton mekardand va pisaronatonro mekustand va zanonatonro zinda meguzostand va dar in az coniʙi Parvardigoraton ʙaroi sumo ozmoise ʙuzurg ʙud»
Va Parvardigoraton e'lom kard, ki agar Maro sukr gued, ʙar ne'mati sumo meafzojam va agar nosukri kuned, ʙidoned, ki azoʙi Man saxt ast
Va Muso guft: «Agar sumo va hamai mardumi rui zamin kofir saved, Xudo ʙenijoz va sazovori sitois ast!»

Ojo xaʙari kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, cun qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud va niz kasone, ki ʙa'd az onho ʙudaand, ʙa sumo narasidaast? Ƣajri Xudo kasero az onon ogohi nest. Pajomʙaronason hamroh ʙo daloili ravsan omadand va onho dast ʙar dahon ʙurdandu guftand: Mo ʙa on ci ʙa on amr sudaed, imon nameovarem va dar cize, ki moro ʙa on mexoned, saxt dar suʙha hastem»

Pajomʙaronason guftand: «Ojo dar Xudo — on ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin — sakke hast? Sumoro da'vat mekunad, to gunohonatonro ʙiʙaxsad va to muddate muajjan sumoro zinda guzorad». Guftand: «Sumo mardumone monandi mo hasted. Mexohed moro az on ci padaronamon meparastidand, ʙozdored. Baroi mo dalele ravsan ʙijovared!»

Pajomʙaronason guftand: mo mardumone monandi sumo hastem, vale Xudo ʙa har jak ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, minnat nihad. Moro nasojad, ki ʙaroi sumo dalele, cuz ʙa farmoni Xudo, ʙijovarem va mu'minon ʙar Xudo tavakkal kunand
Caro ʙar Xudo tavakkal nakunem va hol on ki U rohi moro ʙa mo ʙinamud? Va mo ʙar ozore, ki ʙa mo merasoned, saʙr xohem kard va tavakkalkunandagon ʙar Xudo tavakkal kunand»
Kofiron ʙa Pajomʙaronason guftand: «Jo sumoro az sarzamini xud meronem jo ʙa dini mo ʙozgarded». Pas Parvardigorason ʙa pajomʙaron vahj kard, ki sitamkoronro halok xohem kard
Va sumoro pas az onho dar on sarzamin coj xohem dod, In az oni kasest, ki az istodan dar pesgohi Man va az va'dai azoʙi Man ʙitarsad
Piruzi xostand va har caʙʙori sarkase noumed sud
Pusti saras cahannam ast, to dar on co az oʙi cirku xunas ʙixuronand
Cur'a-cur'a onro menusad va ʙa osoni furu naʙarad va marg az har su ʙar u metozad, ammo namemirad, va azoʙe saxt dar intizori ust
Misoli a'moli kasone, ki ʙa Xudo kofir sudaand, cun xokistarest, ki dar ruze tufoni ʙode saxt ʙar on ʙivazad. Tavoni nigoh dostani on ciro, ki ʙa dast ovardand, nadorand. In ast gumrohii ʙeoxir
Ojo nadidai, ki Xudo osmonhovu zaminro ʙa haq ofaridaast? Agar ʙixohad, sumoro az ʙajn meʙarad va maxluqe nav meovarad
Va in ʙar Xudo dusvor nest

Hama dar pesgohi Xudo hozir ojand. Za'ifon ʙa Onhoe, ki takaʙʙuri mekardand, gujand: «Mo pajravi sumo ʙudem. Ojo aknun metavoned moro ʙa kor oed va andake az azoʙi Xudoro az mo daf' kuned?» Gujand: «Agar Xudo moro hidojat karda ʙud, mo niz sumoro hidojat mekardem. Holo moro rohi xalosi nest. Baroi mo jakson ast, ci ʙetoʙi kunem, ci saʙr varzem»

Cun kor ʙa pojon ojad, sajton gujad: «Xudo ʙa sumo va'da dod va va'dai U durust ʙud va man niz ʙa sumo va'da dodam, vale va'dai xud xilof kardam. Va ʙarojaton hec dalelu ʙurhone najovardam, faqat ki da'vataton kardam, sumo niz da'vati man icoʙat karded, pas maro malomat makuned, xudro malomat kuned. Na man farjodrasi sumojam, na sumo farjodrasi man. Az in ki maro pes az in sariki Xudo karda ʙuded, ʙezoram». Zero ʙaroi sitamkoron azoʙest dardovar

Kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙa ʙihisthoe, ki nahrho dar on corist, darovarand, ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason dar on co covidona ʙimonand va ʙa salom jakdigarro tahijjat (salom) gujand
Ojo nadidai, ki Xudo ci guna misol ovard? Suxani pok cun daraxte pok ast, ki resaas dar zamin ustuvor va soxahojas dar osmon ast
Ba farmoni Xudo har zamon mevai xudro medihad. Xudo ʙaroi mardum misolho meovarad, ʙosad, ki pand girand
Va misoli suxani nopok cun daraxte nopok ast, ki resa dar zamin nadorad va ʙarpo natavonad mond
Xudo mu'minonro ʙa saʙaʙi e'tiqodi ustuvorason dar dunjovu oxirat pojdor medorad. Va zolimonro gumroh mesozad va har ci xohad, hamon mekunad
Ojo nadidai on kasonro, ki ne'mati Xudoro ʙa kufr ivaz soxtand va mardumi xudro ʙa dijori halok ʙurdand
Ba cahannam, on qarorgohi ʙad, doxil mesavand
Baroi Xudo sarikone qaror dodand, to mardumro az rohi U gumroh sozand. Bigu: «Aknun ʙahramand garded, ki ʙozgastaton ʙa otas ast»

Ba ʙandagoni Man, ki imon ovardaand, ʙigu to namoz ʙiguzorand va az on ci ruziason dodaem, nihonu oskoro sadaqa kunand, pes az on, ki ruze faro rasad, ki dar on na xaridu furuxte ʙosad va na hec dustie ʙa kor ojad

Xudost, ki osmonhovu zaminro ofarid va az osmon ʙoron nozil kard va ʙa on ʙoron ʙaroi ruzii sumo mevaho rujonid va kistihoro romi sumo kard to ʙa farmoni U dar dare ravon savand va rudhoro itoatkunandai sumo soxt
Va oftoʙu mohro, ki hamesa dar harakatand, romi sumo kard va saʙu ruzro farmonʙari sumo gardonid
Va har ci az U xosted, ʙa sumo arzoni dostaast va agar xohed, ki ne'mathojasro sumor kuned, natavoned, dar haqiqat odami sitamkor va kofiri ne'mat ast
Va Iʙrohim guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, in sarzaminro tinc gardon va marovu farzandonamro az parastisi ʙuton dur ʙidor
Ej Parvardigori man, inho ʙisjore az mardumro gumroh kardaand, pas har kas, ki az man pajravi kunad, az man ast va har kas farmoni man naʙarad, tu omurzandavu mehruʙoni

Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa'ze az farzandonamro ʙa vodii ʙe hec kistae, nazdiki xonai giromii tu coj dodam, ej Parvardigori mo, to namoz ʙiguzorand. Dilhoi mardumon cunon kun, ki majli onho kunand va az har mevae ruziason deh, sojad, ki sipos guzorand
Ej Parvardigori mo, har ciro pinhon medorem, jo oskor mesozem, Tu ʙa on ogohi. Va ʙar Xudo hec ciz dar zaminu osmon pusida nest
Sipos Xudoero, ki dar in piri Ismoilu Ishoqro ʙa man ato kard. Parvardigori man du'ohoro mesunavad
Ej Parvardigori man, maro va farzandoni maro ʙarpojdorandagoni namoz gardon. Ej Parvardigori mo, du'oi maro ʙipazir
Ej Parvardigori mo, maro va padaru modaram va hamai mu'minonro dar ruzi sumor ʙiʙaxsoi!»
Va napindor, ki Xudo az kirdori sitamkoron ƣofil ast. Azoʙasonro to on ruz, ki casmho dar on xira memonad, ʙa der mepartojad
Mesitoʙand, sarhoro ʙolo giriftaand, casm ʙar ham namezanand va dilhojason xoli az xirad ast

Mardumro az on ruz, ki azoʙ faro merasad, ʙitarson. Sitamkoron megujand: «Bor Xudojo, moro andake muhlat dex, to da'vati Turo icoʙat kunem va ʙa pajomʙaronn Tu pajravi kunem». Ojo sumo pes az in savgand namexurded, ki hargiz zavol namejoʙed? (namemired)
Dar xonahoi kasone, ki xud ʙar xud sitam mekardand, coj girifted va donisted ʙo onon ci guna raftor kardem va ʙarojaton misolho ovardem
Onon najranghoi xud namudand va Xudo az najranghojason ogoh ʙud. Harcand, ki az najranghojasor kuh az poj meaftod
Mapindor, ki Xudo va'daero, ki ʙa pajomʙaronas dodaast, xilof mekunad. Xudovand piruzmand va intiqomgiranda ast
On ruz, ki zamin ʙa zamine ƣajri in zamin muʙaddal savad va osmonho ʙa osmone digar va hama dar pesgohi Xudoi vohidi qahhor hozir ojand
Gunahkoronro dar on ruz ʙa ƣulhoe, ki dastro ʙa gardan ʙandand, ʙasta ʙuʙini
Comahoson az qatron ast va otas rujhojasonro pusidaast
To Xudo har kasro ʙaroʙari amalas cazo dihad, alʙatta Xudo zudhisoʙkunanda ast
In pajomest ʙaroi mardum to ʙa on ʙimnok savand va ʙidonand, ki Ust Xudoi jakto va to xiradmandon pand girand
Alif, lom, ro. In ast-ojoti kitoʙ va Qur'oni ravsangar
Bisjor vaqt kofiron orzu kunand, ki ej kos musalmon meʙudand
Biguzorason, to ʙixurand va ʙahravar savand va orzu ʙa xud masƣulason dorad, ʙa zudi xohand donist
Har dehaero halok kardem, alʙatta zamone ma'lum dost
Hec ummate az acali xud na pes meaftad va na pas memonad
Va guftand: «Ej marde, ki Qur'on ʙa tu nozil suda, haqqo, ki tu devonai
Agar rost megui, caro faristagonro ʙaroi mo nameovari?»
Mo faristagonro ƣajri ʙa haq nozil namekunem va dar on hangom digar muhlatason nadihand
Mo Qur'onro xud nozil kardaem va xud nigahʙonas hastem
Va Mo rasuloni xudro pes az tu ʙa mijoni qavmhoi pesin firistodaem
Har pajomʙare ʙar onho firistoda sud, alʙatta masxaraas kardand
Rohasro dar dili gunahgoron incunin mekusoem
Ba on imon nameovarand va sunnati pesinijon cunin ʙudaast
Agar ʙarojason az osmon dare ʙikusoem, ki az on ʙolo ravand
gujand: «Casmoni moro codu kardaand, ʙalki mo mardume coduzada hastem!»
Va alʙatta dar osmon ʙurchoe ofaridem va ʙaron ʙinandagonason ʙijorostem
Va az har sajtoni racime hifzason kardem
Ƣajri on ki duzdona gus medod va sarorae ravsan ta'qiʙas kard
Va zaminro gusturdem va dar on kuhhoe azim afkandem. Va az har ciz ʙa sevae sancida dar on rujonidem
Va ma'isati sumo va kasonero, ki sumo ruzidehason nested, dar on co qaror dodem
Har ci hast, xazinahoi on nazdi Most va Mo cuz ʙa andozae mu'ajjan onro namefiristem
Va ʙodhoi oʙistankunandaro firistodem va az osmon oʙe nozil kardem va sumoro ʙa on seroʙ soxtem va sumoro narasad, ki xazinadori on, ʙosed
Alʙatta Mo hastem, ki zinda mekunem va memironem va ʙa'd az hama ʙoqi memonem
Va medonem ci kasone az sumo az in pes raftaand va ci kasone ʙoqi mondaand
Va Parvardigori tu hamaro zinda karda cam' megardonad, zero Ust, ki hakimu donost
Mo odamiro az gili xusk, az lacani (loji) ʙujnok ofaridem
Va cinro pes az on az otasi suzandai ʙedud ofarida ʙudem
Va Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon guft: «Mexoham ʙasare az gili xusk, az loi ʙujnok ʙijofarinam
Cun ofarinisamro ʙa pojon ʙurdam va az ruhi Xud dar on damidam, dar ʙaroʙari u ʙa sacda ʙijafted»
Faristagon hamagi sacda kardand
ƣajri Iʙlis, ki sar ʙozzad, ki ʙo sacdakunandagon ʙosad
Guft: «Ej Iʙlis, caro tu az sacdakunandagon Naʙudi?»
Guft: «Man ʙaroi ʙasare, ki az gili xusk, az loji ʙujnok ofaridai, sacda namekunam»
Guft: «Az on co ʙerun sav, ki rondasuda hasti
To ruzi qijomat ʙar tu la'nat ast!»
Guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, maro to ruze, ki duʙora zinda mesavand, muhlat deh»
Guft: «Tu dar sumori muhlatjoftagoni
to on ruze, ki vaqtas ma'lum ast»
Guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, cun maro noumed kardi, dar rui zamin ʙadihoro dar nazarason ʙijorojam va hamagonro gumroh kunam
ƣajri onho, ki ʙandagoni ʙoixlosi Tu ʙosand»
Guft: «Rohi ixlos rohi rostest, ki ʙa Man merasad
Turo ʙar ʙandagoni Man ƣoliʙijate nest, magar ʙar on gumrohone, ki turo pajravi kunand
Va cahannam va'dagohi hama ast
Haft dar dorad va ʙaroi xar dar guruhe az onon mu'ajjan sudaand
Parhezgoron dar ʙihistho, kanori casmasoronand
Ba salomatu emini doxil saved»
Har kinaero az dilason ʙarkandaem, hama ʙarodarand, ʙar taxtho ruʙarui hamand
Hec rance ʙa onho namerasad va az on co ʙerunason naronand
Ba ʙandagonam xaʙar deh, ki man ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙonam
Va azoʙi Man azoʙe dardovar ast
Va az mehmononi Iʙrohim xaʙardorason kun»
On goh, ki ʙar u doxil sudand va guftand: «Salom!» Iʙrohim guft: «Mo az sumo metarsem!»
Guftand: «Matars, mo turo ʙa pisare dono muƶda (xusxaʙar) medihem»
Guft: «Ojo maro muƶda medihed, ʙo on ki pir sudaam? Ba ci ciz muƶdaam medihed?»
Guftand: «Ba haq xusxaʙarat dodem, az noumedon maʙos!»
Guft: «Cuz gumrohon ci kase az rahmati Parvardigoras noumed mesavad?»
Guft: «Ej rasulon, kori sumo cist?»
Guftand: «Mo ʙa sari mardume gunahkor firistoda sudaem
ƣajri xonadoni Lut, ki hamaro nacot medihem
cuz zanasro, ki muqarrar kardaem, ki az ʙoqimondagon ʙosad»
Cun rasulon nazdi xonadoni Lut omadand
Lut guft: «Sumo ʙegonaed»
Guftand: «Na, cizero, ki dar on sak mekardand, ovardaem
Mo turo xaʙari rost ovardaem va mo rostgujonem
Cun pose az saʙ ʙigzarad, xonadoni xudro ʙerun ʙuʙar va xud az pai onho rav va naʙojad hec jak az sumo ʙa aqiʙ ʙingarad. Va har co, ki farmonaton dodaand, ʙiraved»
Va ʙaroi u hodisaro hikojat kardem, ki cun suʙh faro rasad, resai onho ʙarkanda savad
Ahli sahr sodikunon omadand
Guft: «Inho mehmononi manand, maro rasvo makuned
Az Xudovand ʙitarsed va maro sarmsor masozed»
Guftand: «Magar turo az mardum man' nakarda ʙudem?»
Guft: «Agar qasde dored, inak duxtaroni man hastand»
Ba coni tu savgand, ki onho dar mastii xud sargasta ʙudand
Cun suʙh ʙidamid, ononro farjod furu girift
Sahrro zeru zaʙar kardem va ʙorone az siccil ʙar onon ʙoronidem
Dar in iʙrathost ʙaroi iʙratgirandagon
Va on sahr aknun dar sari rohi korvonijon ast
Va mu'minonro dar on iʙratest
Va mardumi Ajka niz sitamkor ʙudand
Az onho intiqom giriftem va sahrhoi on du qavm oskoro ʙar sari rohand
Mardumi Hicr niz pajomʙaronro ʙa duruƣ nisʙat dodand
Ojoti Xudro ʙar onon rasonidem, vale az on ruj megardondand
Xonahoi xudro, to tinc ʙosand, dar kuhho mekandand
Suʙhgohon ononro farjod furu girift
Kirdorason az onho daf'i ʙalo nakard
Osmonhovu zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost, ʙa ƣajri haq najofaridaem. Va ʙesak qijomat faro merasad. Pas guzast kun, guzaste neku
Alʙatta Parvardigori tu ofarinandae donost
Mo saʙ'ammasoni va Qur'oni ʙuzurgro ʙa tu dodem
Agar ʙa'ze az mardonu zanonasonro ʙa cize ʙahravar soxtaem, tu ʙa on nigoh makun. Va ƣami onhoro maxur. Va dar ʙaroʙari mu'minon furutan (xoksor) ʙos
Va ʙigu: «Man ʙimdihandae ravsangaram»
Hamonandi azoʙe, ki ʙar taqsimkunandagon nozil kardem
onol, ki Qur'onrju ʙa qismho taqsim karda ʙudand
Ba Parvardigorat savgand, ki hamaro ʙozxost kunem
ʙa xotiri korhoe, ki mekardaand
Ba har ci amr sudai, sarehu ʙaland ʙigu va az musrikon rujgardon ʙos
Mo masxarakunandagonro az tu ʙozmedorem
onho, ki ʙo Olloh xudoe digar qoil mesavand. Pas ʙa zudi xohand donist
Va medonem, ki tu az guftorason diltang mesavi
Ba sitoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh kun va az sacdakunandagon ʙos
Va Parvardigoratro ʙiparast, to lahzai margat faro rasad
Farmoni Xudovand darrasid, ʙa sitoʙas natalaʙed. U pok ast va az har ci sariki U mesozand, ʙartar ast
Faristagonro hamrohi vahj, ki farmoni Ust, ʙar har jak az ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, pojon mefiristad, to ʙim dihand, ki ƣajri Man xudoe nest, pas az Man ʙitarsed
Osmonhovu zaminro ʙa haq ʙijofarid, az har ci ʙo U sarik mesozand, ʙolotar ast
Odamiro az nutfa ʙijofarid. Va aknun ust, ki ʙa oskoro dusmani mekunad
Cahorpojonro ʙarojaton ʙijofarid, sumoro az onho haroratu digar naf'host. Va az onho mexured
Va cun saʙhangom ʙozmegardoned va ʙomdodon ʙerun mefiristed, nisoni zinatu oʙrui sumojand
Borhojatonro ʙa sahrhoe, ki ʙe ranci tan ʙa onho natavoned rasid, haml mekunand, zero Parvardigoraton musfiqu mehruʙon ast
Va asponu usturonu xaronro ʙaroi on ofaridaast, ki savorason saved va niz zinati sumo ʙosand. Va Xudo cizhoe ofarida, ki sumo namedoned
Bar Xudost, ki rohi rostro ʙinamojad. Az mijoni rohho niz rohest kac. Agar Xudo mexost, hamai sumoro hidojat mekard
Ust, ki az osmon ʙarojaton ʙoron nozil kard. Az on menused va ʙa on gijoh merujad va corpojonro mecaroned
Va ʙo on ʙarojaton kistzor va zajtunu nahlho va tokistonho va har nav' meva ʙirujonad. Dar in iʙratest ʙaroi mardume, ki meandesand
Va musaxxari (toʙe'i) sumo kard saʙu ruzro va xursedu mohro va sitoragon hama farmonʙardori amri U hastand. Dar in ʙaroi onho, ki ʙa aql darmejoʙand, iʙrathost
Dar zamin cizhoe ʙo ranghoi gunogun ofarid, dar in iʙratest ʙaroi mardume, ki pand megirand

Ust, ki darjoro rom kard to az on gusti toza ʙixured va zevarhoe ʙerun ored va xudro ʙa on ʙijoroed va kistihoro ʙini, ki darjoro mesikofand va pes meravand to az fazli Xudo ruzi ʙitalaʙed, sojad, ki sukr gued
Va ʙar zamin kuhhoi ʙuzurg afkand, to sumoro nalarzonad. Va cujhovu rohho padid ovard. Sojad hidojat saved
Va nisonaho nihod va ʙa sitoragon roh mejoʙand
Ojo on ki meofarinad, monandi kasest, ki nameofarinad? Caro darnamejoʙed
Agar ʙixohed ne'mathoi Xudoro sumor kuned, sumor kardan natavoned. Xudo ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
On ciro, ki pinhon mekuned jo oskor mesozed, Xudo ʙa on ogoh ast
Onhoero, ki ʙa coi Olloh ʙa xudoi mexonand, nametavonand cize ʙijofarinand va xud maxluqand
Murdagonand, na zindagon va nadonand, ki ci vaqt onhoro duʙora zinda mekunand
Xudoi sumo Xudoest jakto. Va onon, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand, dilhojason inkor kunad va xud kiʙr kunand
Ba rosti, ki Xudo medonad, ki ci dar dil pinhon medorand va ci cizro oskor mesozand va U mutakaʙʙironro dust nadorad
Cun ʙa onho gufta savad: «Parvardigoraton ci ciz nozil kardaast?» Gujand: «Afsonahoi guzastagon»
To dar ruzi qijomat hamai ʙori gunohi xes va ʙori gunohi kasonero, ki ʙa nodoni gumrohason karda ʙudand, ʙardorand. Ogoh ʙos, ki ʙori ʙade ʙarmedorand
Pesinijonason hilla soxtand. Farmoni Xudo darrasid va on ʙinoro az poja vajron soxt va saqf ʙar sarason furud omad va az sue, ki nafahmidand, azoʙ ononro furu girift

On goh dar ruzi qijomat rasvojason sozad va gujad: «Butone, ki sariki Man mexonded va ʙar sari onho ʙo jakdigar ixtilof mekarded, aknun kucojand?» Donismandon gujand: «Imruz nasiʙi kofiron xorivu azoʙ ast
Kasone hastand, ki ʙar xud sitam ravo dostaand, cun faristagon conasonro ʙisitonand, sari taslim furud orand va gujand: «Mo hec kori ʙade namekardem». Ore, Xudo az korhoe, ki mekarded, ogoh ast
Az darhoi cahannam doxil saved va to aʙad dar on co ʙimoned. Bad cojgohest cojgohi gardankason

Az parhezgoron pursand: «Parvardigori sumo ci ciz nozil kardaast?» Gujand: «Behtarinro». Ba onon, ki dar in dunjo neki kunand, neki muzd dihand va dijori oxirat nekutar az on ast va cojgohi parhezgoron ci cojgohi xuʙest
Ba ʙihisthoi covidon doxil mesavand. Dar on cujho ravon ast. Har ci ʙixohand, ʙarojason muhajjost. Xudo parhezgoronro incunin mukofot medihad
onhoe, ki cun faristagonason poksirat ʙimironand, megujand: «Salom ʙar sumo! Ba mukofoti korhoe, ki mekardaed, ʙa ʙihist daroed»

Ojo casm ʙa rohand, ki faristagon nazdason ʙijojand, jo farmoni Parvardigorat faro rasad? Guruhe niz, ki pes az onho ʙudand, cunin mekardand va Xudo ʙa onho sitam nakard, ʙalki onho xud ʙa xud sitam mekardand
Ba cazoi kirdori ʙadason rasidand va hamon cizhoe, ki ʙa masxara megiriftand, ʙar sarason omad

Musrikon guftand: «Agar Xudo mexost, movu padaronamon hec ciz cuz Uro nameparastidem va on ciro harom kardaem, harom namekardem». Mardume ham, ki pes az onho ʙudand, cunin meguftand. Ojo pajomʙaronro cuz taʙliƣi oskoro vazifai digarest

Ba mijoni har millate pajomʙare firistodem, ki Xudoro ʙiparasted va az ʙut duri cued. Ba'zero Xudo hidojat kard va ʙar ʙa'ze gumrohi muqarrar gast. Pas dar zamin ʙigarded va ʙingared, ki oqiʙati kori kasone, ki pajomʙaronro ʙa duruƣ nisʙat medodand, ci guna ʙudaast
Va agar tu ʙa hidojati onho haris ʙosi, Xudo onro, ki gumroh kardaast, hidojat namekunad va in gumrohonro hec joridihandae nest
To on co, ki metavonistand, ʙa Xudo qasam xurdand, ki Xudo kasonero, ki memirand, ʙa qijomat zinda namekunad. Ore, in va'daest, ki ancom dodani on ʙar uhdai Ust, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
To on ciro ki dar on ixtilof mekardand, ʙarojason oskor kunad va kofiron ʙidonand, ki duruƣ meguftaand
Farmoni Mo ʙa har cize, ki irodaasro ʙikunem, in ast, ki meguem: «Mavcud sav!» Va mavcud mesavad
Ba onon, ki mavridi sitam voqe' sudand va dar rohi Xudo muhocirat kardand, dar in cahon cojgohe neku medihem. Va agar ʙidonand, muzdi oxirat ʙuzurgtar ast
onon, ki saʙr pesa kardand va ʙar Parvardigorason tavakkal mekunand
Agar xud namedoned, az ahli kitoʙ ʙipursed, ki Mo pes az tu ʙa pajƣamʙari nafiristodem, ƣajri mardone, ki ʙa onho vahj mefiristodem
hamroh ʙo daloili ravsan va kitoʙho va ʙar tu niz Qur'onro nozil kardem, to on ciro ʙarsi mardum nozil sudaast, ʙarojason ʙajon kuni va ʙosad, ki ʙijandesand
Ojo onon, ki sodirkunandan ʙadiho mesavand, magar eminand az in, ki zamin ʙa farmoni Xudo onhoro furu ʙarad jo azoʙ az coe, ki namedonand, ʙar sarason furud ojad
Jo ʙa hangomi omaduraft furu giradason, cunon ki natavonand ʙigurezand
Jo az onon jagon-jagon kam kunad? Alʙatta Parvardigoraton musfiqu mehruʙon ast
Ojo ʙa cizhoe, ki Xudo ofaridaast, namenigarand, ki ʙaroi sacda ʙa dargohi U sojahojason az rostu cap harakat dorand va dar ʙaroʙari U xose'and (toʙe'and)
Har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast az cunʙandagonu faristagon Xudoro sacda mekunand va takaʙʙur namevarzand
Az Parvardigorason, ki ʙoloi onhost, metarsand va ʙa har ci amr sudaand, hamon mekunand
Xudo guft: «Du xudoro maparasted va faqat Ust Xudoi jakto. Pas az Man ʙitarsed?»
Harci dar osmonhovu zamin ast, az oni Ust va parastis xosi Ust. Ojo az ƣajri Xudo metarsed
Har ne'mate, ki sumorost, az coniʙi Xudovand ast va cun mehnate ʙa sumo rasad, ʙa pesgohi U zori mekuned
Va ʙoz cun on mehnatro ʙa pojon orad, guruhe az sumo ʙa Parvardigorason musrik mesavand
to ne'matro, ki ʙa onho dodaem, nosukri kunand, Aknun mutamatte' (ʙahramand) saved, ʙa zudi xohed donist
On goh az on ci ruziason dodaem, nasiʙe ʙaroi ʙutone, ki hec namedonand, mu'ajjan mekunand. Ba Xudo savgand ʙa saʙaʙi duruƣe, ki meʙanded, ʙozxost mesaved
Baroi Xudo duxtaron koil mesavand — U pok ast — va ʙaroi xud har ci dust dorand
Va cun ʙa jakeson muƶdai duxtar dihand, sijahruj savad va xasmgin gardad
Az sarmi in muƶda az mardum pinhon mesavad. Ojo ʙo xori nigohas dorad jo dar xok nihonas kunad? Ogoh ʙosed, ki ʙad dovari mekunand
Sifati ʙad az oni kasonest, ki ʙa qijomat imon nameovarand va sifati ʙartar az oni Xudovand ast. Va Ust piruzmandu hakim

Agar Xudovand ʙixohad, ki mardumro ʙa gunohason halok kunad, ʙar rui zamin hec cunʙandae ʙoqi naguzorad, vale azoʙasonro to muddate mu'ajjan ʙa der meafkanad. Va cun acalason faro rasad, jak so'at pasu pes nasavand
On ciro namepisandand, ʙa Xudo nisʙat kunand va zaʙonason ʙa duruƣ gujad, ki xuʙiho az oni onhost, na, ʙesak nasiʙi onho otas ast va onhoro ʙa sitoʙ ʙa sui on ʙarand

Ba Xudo savgand, ki ʙaroi mardume ham, ki pes az tu ʙudaand, pajomʙarone firistodaem. Vale sajton amalhojasonro dar casmason ʙijorost. Va dar on ruz sajton dustason xohad ʙud va onhoro azoʙe dardovar ast
Mo in kitoʙro ʙar tu nozil kardaem, ʙaroi on ki har ciro dar on ixtilof mekunand, ʙarojason ʙajon kuni. Va niz rohnamovu rahmate ʙaroi mu'minon ʙosad
Va Xudo az osmon ʙoron firistod va zamini murdaro ʙo on zinda kard. Baroi mardume, ki gusi sunavo dorand, dar in iʙratest
Baroi sumo dar corpojon pandest. Az siri xolis, ki az sikamason, az mijoni sarginu xun ʙerun meojad, ʙa sumo menusonem. Sire, ki ʙa komi nusandagonas guvorost
Va az mevahoi naxlhovu tokho saroʙe mastiovar va rizqe neku ʙa dast meovared va xiradmandonro dar in iʙratest
Parvardigori tu ʙa zanʙuri asal ilhom dod, ki az kuhhovu daraxton va dar ʙinohoe, ki mesozand, xonahoe intixoʙ kun
On goh az har samarae ʙixur va farmonʙardor ʙa rohi Parvardigorat ʙirav. Az sikami U saroʙe rangorang ʙerun meojad, ki sifoi mardum dar on ast. Va sohiʙoni andesaro dar in iʙratest
Xudo sumoro ʙijofarid, on goh memironad va az mijoni sumo kasero ʙa piri merasonad, to har ciro, ki omuxtaast, az jod ʙiʙarad, zero Xudo donovu tavonost
Xudo ruzii ʙa'ze az sumoro az ʙa'ze digar afzun kardast. Pas onon, ki fuzuni joftaand, az ruzii xud ʙa ƣulomoni xud namedihand, to hama dar ruzi jakson savand. Ojo ne'mati Xudoro inkor mekuned

Xudo ʙaroi sumo az mijoni xudaton hamsarone qaror dod va az hamsaronaton farzandon va farzandzodagon padid ovard va az cizhoi xusu pok ruzijaton dod. Ojo hanuz ʙa ʙotil imon meovarand va ne'mati Xudoro nosukri mekunand
Ƣajri Xudo cizhoero meparastand, ki notavonand va joroi on nadorand, ki az osmonhovu zamin ruzijason dihand
Baroi Xudo misol naored; Xudo medonad va sumo namedoned

Xudo ƣulomi zarxaridero misol meorad, ki hec qudrate nadorad va kasero, ki az coniʙi xud rizqi nekujas dodaem va dar nihonu oskoro nafaqa mekunad. Ojo in du ʙaroʙarand? Sukr xosi Xudost, vale ʙestarason nodonand

Va Xudo misoli du mardro ʙajon mekunad, ki jake lol astu tavoni hec ciz nadorad va ʙori dusi xocai xud ast, har co, ki uro ʙifiristad, hec foidae hosil namekunad. Ojo in mard ʙo on kas, ki mardumro ʙa adl farmon medihad va xud ʙar rohi rost meravad, ʙaroʙar ast
Az oni Xudost nihoni osmonhovu zamin. Va faro rasidani qijomat tanho jak casm ʙar ham zadan jo nazdiktar az on ast. Zero Xudo ʙar har kore tavonost
Xudo sumoro az ʙatni modaronaton ʙerun ovard va hec namedonisted. Va ʙarojaton casmu gusu dil ʙijofarid. Sojad sukr gued
Ojo on parrandagoni romsuda dar cavvi (fazoi) osmonro nameʙinand? Hec kas cuz Xudo onhoro dar havo nigoh natavonad dost. Va dar in ʙaroi mardume, ki imon meovarand, iʙrathost

Xudo xonahojatonro coi oromisaton qaror dod va az pusti cahorpojon ʙarojaton xajmaho soxt, to ʙa hangomi safar va ʙa hangomi muqimi az ʙardostani onho dar ranc naafted. Va az pasmu kurku mujason to ruzi qijomat ʙarojaton asosi xona va asʙoʙi zindagi soxt

Xudo ʙaroi sumo az cizhoe, ki ofaridaast, sojaho padid ovard. Va dar kuhho ʙarojaton ƣorho soxt. Va comahoe, ki sumoro az garmo hifz mekunad va comahoe, ki dar cang nigahdori sumost. Xudo ne'mathoi xudro incunin ʙar sumo komil mekunad. Sojad, ki taslimi farmoni U saved
Agar rujgardon sudand, cuz in nest, ki vazifai tu taʙliƣe oskorost
Ne'mathoi Xudoro mesinosand, ʙez ham munkiri on mesavand, zero ʙestarason kofironand
Ruze, ki az har ummate guvohe ʙigirem va ʙa kofiron ruxsati suxan guftan doda nasavad va uzrason pazirufta nasavad
Va sitamkoron azoʙro ʙingarand, azoʙe, ki hec saʙuki najoʙad va hec muhlatason nadihand
Va cun musrikon ononro, ki sariki Xudo mesoxtand, ʙuʙinand, megujand: «Ej Parvardigori mo, inho sarikone hastand, ki mo ʙa coi Tu onhoro mexondem». Onon posux megujand, ki sumo duruƣ megued
Va dar in ruz ʙa ʙandagi xudro taslimi Xudo kunand va on duruƣho, ki meʙoftaand, noʙud savad
Onon, ki kofir sudand va digaronro az rohi Xudo ʙozdostand, ʙa cazoi fasode, ki mekardand, azoʙe ʙar azoʙason xohem afzud

Va ruze ʙosad, ki az har ummate sohide az xudason ʙar xudason ʙifiristem va turo ʙijovarem, to ʙar onon sahodat dihi. Va mo Qur'onro, ki ʙajonkunandai har cizest va hidojatu rahmat va xusxaʙar ʙaroi musalmonon ast, ʙar tu nozil kardaem
Xudo ʙa adlu ehson va ʙaxsis ʙa xesovandon farmon medihad. Va az fahsovu zistkori va sitam nahj mekunad. Sumoro pand medihad, ʙosad, ki paziroi pand saved
Cun ʙo Xudo pajmon ʙasted, ʙa on vafo kuned va cun savgand xurded, onro maskaned, ki Xudoro zomini xud kardaed va U medonad, ki ci mekuned

Va monandn on zan, ki ristaero, ki mahkam tofta ʙud, az ham kusud va qit'a-qit'a kard, maʙosed, to savgandhoi xudro vasilai fireʙi jakdigar sozed, ʙa in ʙahona, ki guruhe ʙestar az guruhi digar ast. Xudo sumoro ʙa on meozmojad va dar ruzi qijomat cizero, ki dar on ixtilof mekarded, ʙarojaton ʙajon mekunad
Agar Xudo mexost, hamai sumoro jak ummat karda ʙud, vale har kiro ʙixohad, gumroh mesozad va har kiro ʙixohad, hidojat mekunad va az har kore, ki mekuned, ʙozxost mesaved
Savgandhoi xudro vasilai fireʙi jakdigar masozed, to qadamero, ki ustuvor soxtaed, ʙilaƣzad va ʙa saʙaʙi rujgoroni az rohi Xudo giriftori ʙadi saved va ʙa azoʙe ʙuzurg giriftor oed
Pajmoni Xudoro ʙa ʙahoi andak mafurused, zero agar ʙidoned, on ci dar nazdi Xudost, ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast
On ci nazdi sumost, fano mesavad va on ci nazdi Xudost, ʙoqi memonad. Va ononro, ki saʙr varzidand, savoʙe ʙehtar az kirdorason xohem dod
Har zanu marde, ki kore neku ancom dihad, agar imon ovarda ʙosad, zindagii xusu pokizae ʙa u xohem dod va savoʙe ʙehtar az kirdorason ato xohem kard
Va cun Qur'on ʙixoni, az sajtoni racim ʙa Xudo panoh ʙuʙar
Sajtonro ʙar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va ʙar Xudo tavakkal mekunand, ƣoliʙijate nest
Ƣoliʙijati u tanho ʙar kasoneet, ki dustas medorand va ʙa Xudo sirk meovarand
Cun ojaero conisini ojai digar kunem, Xudo ʙehtar medonad, ki ci ciz nozil kunad. Guftand, ki tu duruƣ meʙofi, na, ʙestarinason nodonand
Bigu: «Onro ruhulqudus (Caʙrail (a)) ʙa haq az coniʙi Parvardigorat nozil kardaast, to mu'minonro ustuvori ato namojad va musalmononro hidojatu xusxaʙar ʙosad»
Medonem, ki megujand: «In Qur'onro ʙasare ʙa u meomuzad». Zaʙoni kase, ki ʙa u nisʙat mekunand, acamist, hol on ki in zaʙoni araʙii ravsanest
Xudo kasonero, ki ʙa ojotas imon nameovarand, hidojat namekunad va ʙarojason azoʙe dardovar muhajjost
Kasone duruƣ meʙofand, ki ʙa ojoti Xudo imon nadorand. Inh xud duruƣgujand

Kase, ki pas az imon ʙa Xudo kofir mesavad, na on ki uro ʙa zur vodostaand, to izhori kufr kunad va hol on, kn dilas ʙa imoni xud oromgirandavu osuda ast, ʙar onon, ki dari dilro ʙa rui kufr mekusojand, mavridi xasmi Xudojand va azoʙe ʙuzurg ʙarojason muhajjost
Va in ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki inho zindagii dunjoro ʙestar az zindagii oxirat dust dorand va Xudo mardumi kofirro hidojat namekunad
Xudo ʙar dilu gusho va casmonason muhr nihodaast va xud ʙexaʙarand
Ba nocor dar oxirat ham az zijondidagon ʙosand
Sipas Parvardigori tu ʙaroi kasone, ki pas az on rancho, ki didand, hicrat kardand va ʙa cihod raftand va poj fusurdand, ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
Ruzi qijomat har kas ʙa difo' az xud ʙa mucodala mepardozad va cazoi har kas, cunon ki xaqqi ust, doda mesavad va ʙa kase sitam ravo nadorand
Xudo dehaero misol meorad, ki tincu orom ʙud, ruzii mardumas ʙa farovoni az har co merasid, ammo nosukrii ne'mati Xudo kardand va Xudo ʙa cazoi amalhojason ʙa gurusnagivu vahsat muʙtalojason soxt
Pajomʙare az xudason ʙa nazdason omad, duruƣ ʙarovardand va azoʙ on sitamkoronro furu girift
Az in cizhoi halolu pokiza, ki Xudo ʙa sumo ruzi dodaast, ʙixured va agar Xudoro meparasted, sukri ne'matasro ʙa coj ovared

Xudo harom kardaast ʙar sumo murdoru xun va gusti xuk va har ciro cuz ʙa nomi Xudo zaʙh karda ʙosand. Ammo kase, ki nocor savad, har goh ʙemajli cujad va az had naguzaronad, Xudo ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
To ʙar Xudo duruƣ ʙofed, ʙaroi har duruƣ, ki ʙar zaʙonaton meojad, nagued, ki in halol astu in harom. Kasone, ki ʙa Xudovand duruƣ meʙandand, nacot namejoʙand
Andak foidae meʙarand va dar ivaz ʙa azoʙe dardovar giriftor mesavand
Va ʙar jahudijon on ciro, ki pes az in ʙaroi tu hikojat kardem, harom karda ʙudem. Mo ʙa onho sitam nakardaem, onho xud ʙa xud sitam kardaand
Parvardigori tu ʙaroi kasone, ki az rui nodoni kunandai kore zist savand, sipas tavʙa kunand va ʙa saloh ojand, ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
Iʙrohim ʙuzurgvor marde ʙud. Ba farmoni Xudo ʙar poj istod va sohiʙi dini xolis ʙud. Va az musrikon naʙud
va sukurguzori ne'mathoi U ʙud, Xudovandas intixoʙas kard va ʙa rohi rost hidojat kard
Dar dunjo ʙa u neki ato kardem va dar oxirat az solehon ast
Ba tu niz vahj kardem, ki az dini poki Iʙrohim pajravi kun, ki u az musrikon naʙud
Sanʙe giriftanro (ʙuzurg dostani sanʙero) ʙaroi t; asone, ki dar on ixtilof karda ʙudand, farz kardaand va Parvardigori tu dar ruzi qijomat dar ʙorai on ci ixtilof mekardand, hukm xohad kard

Mardumro ʙo hikmatu pandi neku ʙa rohi Parvardigorat ʙixon va ʙo ʙehtarin tarz ʙo onon mucodala kun. Zero Parvardigori tu ʙa kasone, ki az rohi U kacrav sudaand, ogohtar ast va hidojatjoftagonro ʙehtar mesinosad
Agar uquʙat mekuned, cunon uquʙat kuned, ki sumoro uquʙat kardaand. Va agar saʙr kuned, soʙironro saʙr nekutar ast
Saʙr kun, ki saʙri tu ʙe tavfiqi Xudo nest va ʙarojason ƣamgin maʙos va az makrason diltangi nakun
zero Xudo ʙo kasonest, ki meparhezand va neki mekunand
